Filipino: Paalam, adventurer! Bisitahin mo ulit ako kung may tanong ka tungkol sa paglipad.

English: Why do we all have to wear the same outfit?
Filipino: Bakit kailangan nating magsuot ng parehong kasuotan?

English: Rhisis created the three Clown Gods; Shade, Iblis and Bubble and bestowed each of them with a different aspect of herself. Shade, infused with the Fear and Rage of Rhisis, nearly destroy our original home, Roika.
Filipino: Nilalang ni Rhisis ang tatlong Clown Gods; sina Shade, Iblis at Bubble at binigyan siya ng iba’t ibang anyo. Si Shade, punong-puno ng Takot at Galit ni Rhisis, muntik nang wasakin ang ating orihinal na tahanang Roika.

English: I am Domek Ilujian, the Billposter Wise Man. I am here to record the history of the Billposter Hero, Roentel, and educate travelers on Madrigal's rich history.
Filipino: Ako si Domek Ilujian, ang Billposter Wise Man. Nandito ako para itala ang kasaysayan ng Billposter Hero na si Roentel, at turuan ang mga manlalakbay tungkol sa mayamang kasaysayan ng Madrigal.

English: Farewell, traveler. If we do not learn from our past, we are doomed to repeat it.
Filipino: Paalam, manlalakbay. Kung hindi natin matututuhan ang nakaraan, gagawin natin muli ang mga pagkakamali nito.

English: #b#cff8a004fCheck in here to review the weekly results of the #cfffc0000Guild Siege!#nc#nb
Filipino: #b#cff8a004fTingnan dito para balikan ang lingguhang resulta ng #cfffc0000Guild Siege!#nc#nb

English: Only the most cunning of guilds can hope to achieve victory in the Guild Sieges. Are you ready for the challenge?
Filipino: Tanging mga tusong guild lamang ang maaaring umani ng tagumpay sa Guild Sieges. Handa ka na ba sa hamon?

English: Hello, it's very nice to meet you! I am the Rewards Manager for the Guild Siege Center. I can reward prize money, return application fees, or even show you this week's ranking for the Guild Siege.
Filipino: Kamusta, ikinagagalak kitang makilala! Ako ang Rewards Manager para sa Guild Siege Center. Maaari kitang bigyan ng premyong pera, ibalik ang application fees, o ipakita ang ranggo ngayong linggo para sa Guild Siege.

English: Good luck to you! I hope I see you on the ranking charts!
Filipino: Good luck sa'yo! Sana makita kita sa mga chart ng ranggo!

English: Madrigal's ecosystem is truly fascinating! The more you discover, the greater the mystery!
Filipino: Sobrang kahanga-hanga ang ecosystem ng Madrigal! Lalo kang magiging mausisa habang nadidiskubre mo pa!

English: Researching Madrigal's vast ecosystem, particularly that of the Masquerpets, is very rewarding. I get to work outdoors, and examine all of the strange creatures created by the Clown Goddess of Fear and Rage, Shade.
Filipino: Napakabunga ng pananaliksik sa ecosystem ng Madrigal, lalo na ng mga Masquerpets. Masaya ako na nagtatrabaho sa labas at sinusuri ang mga kakaibang nilalang na nilikha ng Clown Goddess ng Takot at Galit, si Shade.

English: My name is Dr. Estly and I am studying Madrigal's Ecosystem with my 2 brothers. Have you ever heard of Clockworks? He is the most amazing creature I have ever had the chance to study! Very, very dangerous, though.
Filipino: Ako si Dr. Estly at pinag-aaralan ko ang Ecosystem ng Madrigal kasama ang aking dalawang kapatid. Narinig mo na ba si Clockworks? Siya ang pinaka-kamangha-manghang nilalang na nasaksihan ko—napakadelikado.

English: Thanks for stopping by, friend. Let me know if you ever need any information on a specific creature.
Filipino: Salamat sa pagdaan, kaibigan. Sabihin mo lang kung kailangan mo ng impormasyon tungkol sa isang partikular na nilalang.

English: Assists are way better than Mercenaries! Quiet Mustang! *chuckles* Hey you, c'mere if you want to learn about Assists!
Filipino: Mas magaling ang Assists kaysa sa Mercenaries! Tahimik ka, Mustang! *tawa* Hoy, halika dito kung gusto mong matuto tungkol sa Assists!

English: What is that crazy Mustang babbling about now... Ah, no matter. Every party needs an Assist. Any schmuck can wack a monster in the head, but we can do that AND play a support role! Do you like popularity? Than this is the job for you!
Filipino: Ano ang pinagsasalitaan ng baliw na Mustang ngayon... Ah, basta na lang. Kailangan ng bawat party ang isang Assist. Kahit sino puwedeng hampasin ang halimaw sa ulo, pero kami ang puwedeng gawin iyon at tumulong pa! Gusto mo ba ng kasikatan? Ito ang trabahong para sa'yo!

English: I am Captain Elic Eward of the Madrigal Job Training Center. If you want to become an Assist, I can help you.
Filipino: Ako si Captain Elic Eward ng Madrigal Job Training Center. Kung gusto mong maging Assist, tutulungan kita.

English: Remember, every party needs an Assist! Don't leave home without us!
Filipino: Tandaan, kailangan ng bawat party ang Assist! Huwag umalis na wala kami!

English: Yay! I am so happy! Bubble smiles on us!
Filipino: Yehey! Ang saya ko! Ngumingiti si Bubble sa atin!

English: I may not look like much, but I'm very powerful. I'm ready for anything! The Soldiers of Kion will prevail!
Filipino: Maaaring hindi ako mukhang malaki, pero malakas ako. Handa na ako sa kahit ano! Mananalo ang Soldiers of Kion!

English: My name is Eoners Archer and I am one of the hired soldiers of Kion. We are here to protect the citizens of Flarine, as long as the money is right. \n*wink*
Filipino: Ako si Eoners Archer at isa ako sa mga hired soldiers ng Kion. Nandito kami para protektahan ang mga mamamayan ng Flarine—kung tama lang ang bayad. \n*wink*

English: Love to Kion!!
Filipino: Pagmamahal para sa Kion!!

English: Welcome to Flarine! Please, enjoy your stay!
Filipino: Maligayang pagdating sa Flarine! Sana mag-enjoy ka!

English: Flarine is the capital city of Madrigal. It may be a small city, but it's certainly the most beautiful. Feel free to come see me if you ever need anything.
Filipino: Ang Flarine ang kabisera ng Madrigal. Maliit man, ito ang pinakamaganda. Bisitahin mo ako kung kailangan mo ng tulong.

English: I am the mayor of Flarine. The well-being of the citizens is my highest priority. Is there anything I can help you with?
Filipino: Ako ang mayor ng Flarine. Ang kapakanan ng mga mamamayan ang una kong prayoridad. May maitutulong ba ako?

English: #b#cff8a004fWe have a #cfffc0000Guild Siege #b#cff8a004fevery Saturday. Speak to the Guild Siege Managers for more information!#nc#nb
Filipino: #b#cff8a004fMayroon kaming #cfffc0000Guild Siege #b#cff8a004fbawat Sabado. Kausapin ang Guild Siege Managers para sa karagdagang impormasyon!#nc#nb

English: *scribbles* Ah, yes! This is good stuff... I'm such a great writer! Now I just need a good protagonist...
Filipino: *isinasaisip* Ah, oo! Maganda ito... Ang husay ko sa pagsusulat! Kailangan ko na lang ng mahusay na pangunahing tauhan...

English: I am writing one of my best novels yet! It's action-packed, fast paced, dark, and even a little scary! It's about this hero who enters a dark cave and... well wait, if I tell you, you might steal my idea! Who are you anyway!?
Filipino: Gumagawa ako ng isa sa pinakamahusay kong nobela! Action-packed, mabilis, madilim, at nakakatakot din! Tungkol ito sa bayani na pumapasok sa madilim na kuweba at... sandali, baka nakawin mo ang ideya ko kung sabihin ko! Sino ka ba naman?!

English: Pleased to meet you! My name is Gergantes Hambert. I live here in Flarine and I love it. I am a famous novelist as well as the Chairman of the Publication Society. Do you like to read?
Filipino: Ikinagagalak kitang makilala! Ako si Gergantes Hambert. Nakatira ako dito sa Flarine at mahal ko ang lugar na ito. Ako rin ang Chairman ng Publication Society. Mahilig ka bang magbasa?

English: My next novel will be a best seller, I'm sure! Keep an eye out for it!
Filipino: Sigurado akong best-seller ang susunod kong nobela! Bantayan mo 'yan!

English: We, the Soldiers of Kion, are family!
Filipino: Kami, ang Soldiers of Kion, ay parang pamilya!

English: Don't speak to me as if you know me, stranger. I am the most feared martial artist in all of Madrigal. I can take you down with one finger!
Filipino: Huwag mo akong kausapin na parang kilala mo ako, dayo. Ako ang pinaka-natatakot na martial artist sa buong Madrigal. Kaya kitang pabagsakin ng isang daliri!

English: My name is Ghalade Elore, if you must know. I am one of the hired Kion Soldiers for Flarine. I am a legend in the world of martial arts, as I've followed in the footsteps of Roentel. Don't cross me.
Filipino: Ako si Ghalade Elore—isa sa mga hired Kion Soldiers para sa Flarine. Legenda ako sa martial arts, sinusundan ang yapak ni Roentel. Huwag mo akong galawin.

English: Glory to Kion
Filipino: Kaluwalhatian para sa Kion

English: Tucani! Would you PLEASE stop singing that stupid song? I have a headache...
Filipino: Tucani! Puwede bang itigil mo na yang nakakainis na kantang 'yan? Masakit ulo ko...

English: Humans look down us because we used to do their work for them. But as 'smart' as humans may be, we are far stronger. We are by no means, inferior. Understand?
Filipino: Mina-maliitin kami ng mga tao dahil dati kami ang gumagawa ng kanilang trabaho. Pero kahit 'matalino' ang mga tao, mas malakas kami. Hindi kami inferior. Naiintindihan mo?

English: Yeah, not gonna happen. If you didn't already figure it out, we don't particularly like you people. So unless you have some sort of business to discuss, I suggest you leave. Now.
Filipino: Oo, hindi mangyayari. Kung hindi mo pa napapansin, hindi talaga namin kayo gusto. Kaya kung wala kang negosyo, mas mabuting umalis ka. Ngayon.

English: It's about time you left...
Filipino: Panahon na para umalis ka...

English: Only the bravest of adventurers should dare to enter. Are you prepared?
Filipino: Tanging pinakamatapang na adventurer ang dapat pumasok. Handa ka na ba?

English: You are brave, young one. Go with honor.
Filipino: Matapang ka, batang nasa pag-asa. Humayo nang may karangalan.

English: If you have any doubts whatsoever, you should just quit now. Too much blood has been spilled already over all of this.
Filipino: Kung nag-aalinlangan ka, mas mabuting umatras ka na. Sobrang dugo na ang natapon dahil dito.

English: You are indeed foolish if you think you can go in there alone. You must bring friends if you wish to have a even a small chance at victory.
Filipino: Totoong hangal ka kung akala mo makakapasok mag-isa. Kailangan mo ng mga kaibigan para kahit maliit na tsansa lamang ng tagumpay.

English: You are not yet ready to challenge the beast within this lair. You are foolish if you think I would allow you to enter.
Filipino: Hindi ka pa handa para hamunin ang halimaw sa loob ng yungib na ito. Hangal ka kung akala mo papayagan kitang pumasok.

English: Travel to Northern Flarine and speak with the Novelist there. I cannot help you.
Filipino: Pumunta ka sa Northern Flarine at kausapin ang Novelist doon. Hindi kita matutulungan.

English: No, not yet. You are not qualified to challenge this creature yet. Now please, leave in peace.
Filipino: Hindi pa. Hindi ka pa kwalipikadong hamunin ang nilalang na ito. Umalis ka na nang mapayapa.

English: So you want to know who I am, my child? I exist... and yet, I do not exist. That is all you need to know and I will tell you no more.
Filipino: Gusto mo bang malaman kung sino ako, anak? Umiiral ako... at gayun din, hindi ako umiiral. Iyon lang ang kailangan mong malaman at wala na akong sasabihin pa.

English: Farewell, brave one.
Filipino: Paalam, magiting.

English: Worry not, Hormes. We will not fail.
Filipino: Huwag kang mag-alala, Hormes. Hindi tayo magpapahuli.

English: It's hard to interpret the ancient texts. They are extremely old and in poor condition. What we have discerned, is that the fight for peace is far from over, and we must prepare ourselves for what's coming.
Filipino: Mahirap intindihin ang mga sinaunang teksto. Napakamatanda at sira na ng kondisyon. Ang napag-alaman namin: malayo pa ang laban para sa kapayapaan, at kailangang maghanda tayo sa darating.

English: My name is Guabrill Elldoradin, the Blade Wise Man. We've all come together to guide to adventurer's such as your self on the path of the Heroes. Will you stand up for Madrigal, young one?
Filipino: Ako si Guabrill Elldoradin, ang Blade Wise Man. Nagkakaisa kami para gabayan ang mga adventurer na katulad mo sa landas ng mga Hero. Tatayo ka ba para sa Madrigal, batang nasa pag-asa?

English: The Heroes will never be forgotten. Stories of their sacrifice will be told for generations to come.
Filipino: Hindi malilimot ang mga Hero. Ang kanilang mga sakripisyo ay ikukuwento sa susunod na mga henerasyon.

English: #b#cff8a004fWelcome, competitors! The #cfff60000Guild Siege Application Center #cff8a004fis open for business!#nc#nb
Filipino: #b#cff8a004fMaligayang pagdating, mga kalahok! Ang #cfff60000Guild Siege Application Center #cff8a004fyay bukas na!#nc#nb

English: If your guild has reached the point where you think you have the strength and numbers to compete against another guild, then you’re in the right place. Prove to everyone that you’re able to become a legend like Badza!
Filipino: Kung sa palagay ng guild mo na may lakas at bilang na kayong makipagsabayan sa ibang guild, nasa tamang lugar ka. Patunayan mong kaya mong maging alamat tulad ni Badza!

English: It's a pleasure to make your acquaintance. I am the Guild Siege Master of Flarine. Speak with me if you need general Guild Siege information, want to apply, form your party, or enter the arena.
Filipino: Ikinalulugod kitang makilala. Ako ang Guild Siege Master ng Flarine. Kausapin ako kung kailangan mo ng pangkalahatang impormasyon tungkol sa Guild Siege, mag-apply, bumuo ng party, o pumasok sa arena.

English: For Glory!
Filipino: Para sa Karangalan!

English: I smell human... gross!
Filipino: Naamoy ko ang amoy ng tao... kadiri!

English: We are superior to humans in all ways. You're lucky I'm even speaking to you. Now, what is it you want? Can't you see I'm busy?
Filipino: Nangunguna kami sa lahat ng aspeto laban sa tao. Buti na lang at pinag-uusapan pa kita. Ano ang gusto mo? Hindi mo ba nakikita na abala ako?

English: Who wants to know? You? Haha! Right, like I owe you anything at all, human. Why don't you make like a tree, and get out of here?
Filipino: Sino'ng nagtatanong? Ikaw? Hahaha! Parang may utang pa ako sayo, tao. Bakit hindi ka na lang umalis?

English: Thanks for leaving, chump!
Filipino: Salamat sa pag-alis, tanga!

English: So you want to know who I am, my child? I exist... and yet, I do not exist. That is all you need to know and I will tell you no more.
Filipino: Gusto mo bang malaman kung sino ako, anak? Umiiral ako... at gayun din, hindi ako umiiral. Iyon lang ang kailangan mong malaman at wala na akong sasabihin pa.

English: Shade will return, this much is certain. We can only hope to be ready for her.
Filipino: Babalik si Shade, tiyak iyon. Hangad lang namin na maging handa tayo.

English: We await the day of our impending doom. The day will come, and pass. We must stand together.
Filipino: Naghihintay kami sa araw ng nalalapit na kapahamakan. Darating ang araw, at lilipas. Dapat tayong magkaisa.

English: My name is Hormes Kudo, the Knight Wise Man. I lead those who wish to become a Knight successor, and I help to preserve the memory of the Heroes.
Filipino: Ako si Hormes Kudo, ang Knight Wise Man. Pinamumunuan ko ang mga nais maging Knight successor at tumutulong panatilihin ang alaala ng mga Hero.

English: Rhisis watch over you.
Filipino: Bantayan ka ni Rhisis.

English: Draw your weapon and cut down everything that stands in your way! A Mercenary fears nothing!
Filipino: Bunot ang sandata at putulin ang lahat ng nakahahadlang sa'yo! Walang kinatatakutan ang isang Mercenary!

English: The three most important things for a successful Mercenary are instinct, courage, and level headedness. If you possess these qualities, then you have what it takes to be a Mercenary.
Filipino: Ang tatlong pinakamahahalagang bagay para maging matagumpay na Mercenary ay instinct, tapang, at kalmadong pag-iisip. Kung taglay mo ito, handa ka na maging Mercenary.

English: Hello, my friend. It is my pleasure to make your acquaintance. My name is Hyuit Jenive and I am a sergeant of the Madrigal Job Training Center. I help train Vagrants to become Mercenaries, after Mustang signs off on them, of course.
Filipino: Kumusta, kaibigan. Ikinagagalak kitang makilala. Ako si Hyuit Jenive, isang sergeant sa Madrigal Job Training Center. Tinutulungan kong mag-training ng Vagrants para maging Mercenaries, kapag pumayag si Mustang, siyempre.

English: Keep your pride, courage and hope!
Filipino: Panatilihin ang iyong dangal, tapang at pag-asa!

English: Welcome! If you need any help or information, please don't hesitate to ask.
Filipino: Maligayang pagdating! Kung kailangan mo ng tulong o impormasyon, huwag mag-atubiling magtanong.

English: Hi there, I have a quest for you!
Filipino: Hoy, may quest ako para sa'yo!

English: Welcome to Madrigal. You look lost! Is there anything I can help you with?
Filipino: Maligayang pagdating sa Madrigal. Mukhang nawawala ka! May maitulong ba ako?

English: I am Is, and I am one of the guides in Flarine City. If you need any help or information, just ask me or my twin sisters!
Filipino: Ako si Is, isa sa mga guide sa Flarine City. Kung kailangan mo ng tulong o impormasyon, tanungin mo lang ako o ang kambal kong magkakapatid!

English: There are several of us throughout Flarine and we all look alike so try not to get confused, tee hee! We confuse ourselves sometimes so it's alright if you do.
Filipino: Marami kaming katulad na tao sa Flarine kaya huwag malito. Minsan kami mismo naguguluhan—okay lang 'yan kung mangyari sayo.

English: Anyway, stop by and see me anytime if you need any help or information. That's what we're all here for!
Filipino: Bumisita ka lang kung kailangan mo ng tulong o impormasyon. Nandito kami para sa'yo!

English: Flarine is the most beautiful city in Madrigal, in my humble opinion. It's always spring here and I love it. Just be careful of all the Masquerpets outside the city.
Filipino: Para sa akin, ang Flarine ang pinakamagandang lungsod sa Madrigal. Parang tag-init palagi rito at mahal ko ito. Mag-ingat lang sa mga Masquerpets sa labas ng lungsod.

English: If you're going to explore the wilds of Flaris, make sure you stock up on supplies from one of our many vendors here before you leave.
Filipino: Kung mag-eexplore ka sa wilds ng Flaris, siguraduhing kumuha ka ng suplay mula sa isa sa maraming tindahan rito bago ka umalis.

English: There are many shops in the city that sell everything from food and drink, to weapons and armor. Have a look around to see what we have available!
Filipino: Maraming tindahan sa lungsod na nagbebenta ng lahat mula pagkain at inumin hanggang sandata at baluti. Silipin mo and tingnan kung ano ang available!

English: You can also purchase exotic items from the many private shops in the area. These shops are usually run by other adventurers, such as yourself.
Filipino: Maaari ka ring bumili ng mga exotic items mula sa mga private shops sa area. Karaniwang pinapatakbo ito ng mga ibang adventurer gaya mo.

English: People from all over Madrigal visit this city every day to shop and enjoy the sights. It is so beautiful here. Is there anything else I can assist you with?
Filipino: Dumarayo rito ang mga tao mula sa buong Madrigal araw-araw para mamili at mag-enjoy. Napakaganda rito. May maitutulong pa ba ako?

English: If your Health Points (HP) reach zero, you will die. Not to worry, though, you have several options when this happens.
Filipino: Kapag umabot sa zero ang iyong Health Points (HP), mamatay ka. Huwag mag-alala—may ilang opsyon ka.

English: If you select Lodestar, you will be summoned back to town and resurrected. Alternatively, players who've chosen the Assist Job can often resurrect you where you died.
Filipino: Kung pipiliin mo ang Lodestar, masusummon ka pabalik sa bayan at mare-resurrect. Bilang alternatibo, ang mga player na pumili ng Assist Job ay madalas makakapag-resurrect sa'yo sa lugar ng iyong pagkamatay.

English: In addition to this, you can also purchase a Scroll of Resurrection by selecting the Premium Item Shop icon on your task bar. This allows you to resurrect in place.
Filipino: Bilang karagdagan, maaari kang bumili ng Scroll of Resurrection sa pamamagitan ng pagpili ng Premium Item Shop icon sa task bar. Pinapahintulutan ka nitong mag-resurrect sa mismong lugar.

English: Goodbye, adventurer. Enjoy your stay in Flarine!
Filipino: Paalam, adventurer. Mag-enjoy sa pananatili mo sa Flarine!

English: I am Iske Trinity, and I am one of the guides in Flarine City. I also run a beauty shop. If you need any help or information, just ask me or my twin sisters!
Filipino: Ako si Iske Trinity, isa sa mga guide sa Flarine City. Ako rin ang nagpapatakbo ng beauty shop. Kung kailangan mo ng tulong o impormasyon, itanong mo lang sa akin o sa kambal kong mga kapatid!

English: My name is Ismerelda Trinity, and I am one of the guides in Flarine City. If you need any help or information, just ask me or one of my twin sisters!
Filipino: Ako si Ismerelda Trinity, isa sa mga guide sa Flarine City. Kung kailangan mo ng tulong o impormasyon, itanong mo lang sa akin o sa isa sa aking mga kambal na kapatid!

English: I am Ispim Trinity, and I am one of the guides in Flarine City. If you need any help or information, just ask me or one of my twin sisters!
Filipino: Ako si Ispim Trinity, isa sa mga guide sa Flarine City. Kung kailangan mo ng tulong o impormasyon, itanong mo lang sa akin o sa isa sa aking kambal na kapatid!

English: I am Isruel Trinity, and I am one of the guides in Flarine City. If you need any help or information, just ask me or one of my twin sisters!
Filipino: Ako si Isruel Trinity, isa sa mga guide sa Flarine City. Kung kailangan mo ng tulong o impormasyon, itanong mo lang sa akin o sa isa sa aking kambal na kapatid!

English: *sigh* I miss Kimberly so much. I can barely focus on my duties...
Filipino: *sigh* Miss na miss ko si Kimberly. Halos hindi na ako maka-concentrate sa trabaho ko...

English: Would you do me a favor, please?
Filipino: Pwede mo ba akong pakiusapan ng isang pabor, please?

English: Ugh, I still get so many complaints about the machines I sold to Saint City and Darken City. I may have used substandard building materials from the Dekane Mine. Ah well...
Filipino: Ugh, ang dami ko pa ring reklamo tungkol sa mga makinang ibinenta ko sa Saint City at Darken City. Baka gumamit ako ng hindi gaanong kalidad na materyales mula sa Dekane Mine. Ayos lang...

English: My name is Jeff Prosis and I am the Machine Developer of Flarine. Kimberley, my wife, is a guide in Saint City.
Filipino: Ako si Jeff Prosis at ako ang Machine Developer ng Flarine. Si Kimberley, ang asawa ko, ay guide sa Saint City.

English: Say hello to my wife, Kimberly, in Saint City if you happen to see her, will you?
Filipino: Sabihin mo kay Kimberly na kumusta mula sa akin kapag nakita mo siya sa Saint City, ha?

English: Iblis above! Ddukguk has disappeared! Oh, what should I do now. Please, somebody help me!!!
Filipino: Iblis sa itaas! Nawala si Ddukguk! Ano na ngayon gagawin ko. Tulungan niyo naman ako!!!

English: I have wanted to be a cook since I was a child and now, in my old age, I can finally live my dream. I have never been more happy.
Filipino: Mula pagkabata gusto ko nang maging cook at ngayon, sa edad ko na, natutupad na ang pangarap ko. Hindi pa ako naging mas masaya.

English: My name is Juglin Girliart and I am helping Losha cook.
Filipino: Ako si Juglin Girliart at tumutulong ako magluto kay Losha.

English: Happy New Year!
Filipino: Maligayang Bagong Taon!

English: Welcome to the #b#cffff0000Office.#nc#nb of Flarine. How can I be of service?
Filipino: Maligayang pagdating sa #b#cffff0000Office.#nc#nb ng Flarine. Paano ako makakatulong?

English: So what can you do for me, huh?
Filipino: So, ano ang maitutulong mo sa akin, ha?

English: *Sigh* Boboku is so manly, strong and kind. But I could never date him because his belly is too big!
Filipino: *Sigh* Ang lakas talaga ni Boboku—maskulado, malakas at mabait. Pero hindi ko siya pwedeng ligawan dahil sobrang laki ng tiyan niya!

English: My name is Julia Trinity and I manage the Office of Flarine. How can I help you today?
Filipino: Ako si Julia Trinity at ako ang nagma-manage ng Office ng Flarine. Paano kita matutulungan ngayon?

English: Spread the blessing of Rhisis throughout Madrigal! Sprinkle the tears of Rhisis upon the ground. Welcome to the club, Assist!
Filipino: Ikalat ang pagpapala ni Rhisis sa buong Madrigal! Budburan ang lupa ng luha ni Rhisis. Welcome sa club, Assist!

English: An Assist should naturally have a giving heart. It's one of the fundamental teachings of Aenn, the Ringmaster Hero.
Filipino: Dapat may mapagbigay na puso ang isang Assist. Isa 'yan sa mga pangunahing aral ni Aenn, ang Ringmaster Hero.

English: They call me Kidmen Nicore. I'm a Sergeant at the Madrigal Job Training Center and I hope to guide brave souls as they follow the path to becoming an Assist.
Filipino: Sinasabing Kidmen Nicore ang pangalan ko. Ako ay Sergeant sa Madrigal Job Training Center at inaasahan kong gagabayan ko ang matatapang na kaluluwa patungo sa landas ng pagiging Assist.

English: Be careful out there, young one. I sense great potential in you.
Filipino: Mag-ingat ka roon, bata. Nakikita ko ang malaking potensyal sa iyo.

English: We must lead these brave adventurers on the right path, Radyon.
Filipino: Dapat nating gabayan ang mga matatapang na adventurer sa tamang landas, Radyon.

English: Hello, my friend. There is something I require your assistance with. Will you help me?
Filipino: Kumusta, kaibigan. May kailangan akong tulong mo. Tutulungan mo ba ako?

English: The Heroes saved us all from certain doom. We are forever grateful for their bravery. Will you follow the path of the Heroes?
Filipino: Iniligtas tayo ng mga Hero mula sa tiyak na kapahamakan. Habambuhay tayong nagpapasalamat sa kanilang tapang. Susundan mo ba ang landas ng mga Hero?

English: My name is Sage Kimel and I am here as a guide to those seeking the knowledge of the Heroes. Sage Radion is the greatest Wise Man of all of us. If you seek knowledge, go to him.
Filipino: Ako si Sage Kimel at narito ako bilang gabay sa mga naghahanap ng kaalaman tungkol sa mga Hero. Si Sage Radion ang pinakamahalagang Wise Man sa aming lahat. Kung naghahanap ka ng karunungan, puntahan siya.

English: The Heroes live on through all of us.
Filipino: Buhay pa rin ang mga Hero sa ating lahat.

English: Hello there, traveler! This area, the plain of Bubble, was created by Bubble himself, long ago.
Filipino: Kumusta, manlalakbay! Ang lugar na ito, ang Plain of Bubble, ay nilikha ni Bubble mismo, noon nang matagal na panahon.

English: The earth trembled as the battle between Shade and the Heroes was fought viciously. Scars from this battle can be seen all over madrigal.
Filipino: Nanginginig ang lupa nang pinag-alab ang labanan nina Shade at ng mga Hero. Makikita mo pa ang mga sugat ng labanan sa buong Madrigal.

English: Welcome, my name is Kurmin Hersan and I watch over the Plain of Bubble. It's an amazing area filled with life. It is a powerful place that seems to fill your soul with love and euphoria.
Filipino: Maligayang pagdating, ako si Kurmin Hersan at binabantayan ko ang Plain of Bubble. Ang lugar na ito ay puno ng buhay—nakakapanginig at puno ng pagmamahal at euphoria.

English: Oh man! All this shoveling, all day long! Can't I have a break?!
Filipino: Naku! Lahat ng paghuhukay buong araw! Pwede bang magpahinga na ako minsan?!

English: *Langdrong grins at you*\nYou want me to say hello to you? Haha, never! I may live like you humans but I am nothing like you! So nyah!
Filipino: *Langdrong grins at you*\nGusto mo ba ng bati mula sa akin? Haha, hindi! Maaaring parang mamuhay ako tulad ninyo, pero hindi ako katulad ninyo! So nyah!

English: Me? You want to know who I am? Hahaha! What a shame the feeling isn't mutual. I am High-Dwarpet Langdrong Clo and I'm the keeper of the Mercenaries Book of Technique. Happy?
Filipino: Ako? Gusto mong malaman kung sino ako? Hahaha! Sayang, hindi pareho ang pakiramdam. Ako si High-Dwarpet Langdrong Clo at ako ang tagapag-ingat ng Mercenaries Book of Technique. Masaya ka ba?

English: Steer clear of the other Dwarpets. They may not be as nice as I am.
Filipino: Lumayo ka sa ibang Dwarpets. Maaaring hindi sila kasing bait ko.

English: My name is Flaris Pang. I am the oldest son of the Pang family. We have managed the Lodelights for generations.
Filipino: Ako si Flaris Pang. Ako ang panganay na anak ng Pang family. Pinamamahalaan namin ang Lodelights nang generasyon na.

English: Need a moment? Grab a chocolate bar from Losha's Premium Foods Shop!
Filipino: Kailangan mo ba ng pahinga? Kumuha ka ng chocolate bar sa Losha's Premium Foods Shop!

English: I wonder, can you do something for me? I could really use your help.
Filipino: Naisip ko—pwede mo ba akong tulungan? Talagang kailangan ko ng tulong mo.

English: Hello, welcome to Losha's Premium Foods Shop! We are here to serve the citizens of Flarine with the most tasty treats penya can buy! So whaddya say, are ya' hungry?
Filipino: Maligayang pagdating sa Losha's Premium Foods Shop! Naghahain kami sa mga mamamayan ng Flarine ng pinakamasarap na pagkain na mabibili mo sa penya! So, gutom ka ba?

English: My name is Losha Encline. Apprentice Sotta, my little sister Loyah, and myself all live together and help to run my Food Shop. I've been told I'm the best cook in Madrigal! Care to try a Kimbap?
Filipino: Ako si Losha Encline. Kasama ko rito si Apprentice Sotta, ang nakababatang kapatid kong si Loyah, at magkasama naming pinapatakbo ang Food Shop. Sinasabi ng iba na ako ang pinakamahusay na kusinera sa Madrigal! Tikman mo ang aming Kimbap?

English: Thank you, come again!
Filipino: Salamat, balik ka na!

English: Hungry? Visit my sister Losha's Food Shop! *YUM*
Filipino: Gutóm ka ba? Punta ka sa food shop ng kapatid kong si Losha! *YUM*

English: My sister and I make a lot of super yummy food! One day, I hope to open a shop of my own, but I still have a lot to learn. Will you try some of our delicious Chicken Sticks? The secret's in the sauce!
Filipino: Magkapatid kami at gumagawa kami ng napakasarap na pagkain! Balang araw magbubukas din ako ng sarili kong shop, pero marami pa akong kailangang matutunan. Tikman mo ang Chicken Sticks namin—sekreto ang sauce!

English: My name is Loyah Encline, and I'm a cook for my elder sister Losha's Food Shop. We're working on a new recipe for Mushpoie Stew, but I can't tell you the ingredients. It's a family secret!
Filipino: Ako si Loyah Encline, kusinera sa Food Shop ng ate kong si Losha. Gumagawa kami ng bagong resipe para sa Mushpoie Stew, pero hindi ko puwedeng sabihin ang mga sangkap—family secret!

English: Bon Appetit!
Filipino: Bon Appetit!

English: Are you a Vagrant? Do you need weapons or armor? I've got what you need!
Filipino: Vagrant ka ba? Kailangan mo ba ng sandata o kalasag? Meron ako ng kailangan mo!

English: Hello, potential customer! Thanks for stopping by! Please, feel free to look at my collection of Vagrant weapons and armor. Careful though, you touch it, you buy it!
Filipino: Kumusta, potensyal na customer! Salamat sa pagdaan! Silipin mo ang koleksyon ko ng Vagrant weapons at armor. Pag hinawakan mo, nabibili mo—ingat!

English: My name is Luda and I run the Vagrant Store of Flarine. I opened this shop after Boboku and Boboko stopped selling Vagrant items. Now I corner the market, hahaha!
Filipino: Ako si Luda at ako ang nagpapatakbo ng Vagrant Store ng Flarine. Binuksan ko ito pagkatapos tumigil sina Boboku at Boboko sa pagbebenta ng Vagrant items. Ngayon, monopoly na ako, hahaha!

English: Be careful out there. I wouldn't want to lose a potential customer! *Chuckles*
Filipino: Mag-ingat ka roon. Ayaw kong mawala ang potensyal na customer! *Tawang bahagya*

English: Come one, come all! Get your supplies here! You're gonna need it!
Filipino: Halina kayo, kumuha ng suplay dito! Kakailanganin niyo 'yan!

English: Listen carefully, here's what I need you to do.
Filipino: Makinig mabuti, ito ang kailangan kong ipagawa sa'yo.

English: Going somewhere? You look a little unprepared, so I'd think twice about leaving Flarine without stocking up on supplies. Good thing for you, I'm here. So, whaddya need?
Filipino: Papunta ka ba? Mukhang hindi ka gaanong handa—isipin mong mabuti kung aalis ng Flarine nang walang suplay. Buti na lang nandito ako. Ano'ng kailangan mo?

English: Who am I? I'm Lui Keraldine, of course. My friends call me Handsome Lui. Since we're not friends, why don't you just call me Lui. If you buy something from my General Store here, I *might* let you call me Handsome.
Filipino: Sino ako? Siyempre, ako si Lui Keraldine. Tinatawag akong Handsome Lui ng mga kaibigan ko. Dahil hindi tayo magkaibigan, tawagin mo na lang akong Lui. Kung bibili ka sa General Store ko, baka payagan kitang tawagin akong Handsome.

English: Don't forget to shop at Handsome Lui's General Shop for your adventuring needs!
Filipino: Huwag kalimutang mamili sa Handsome Lui's General Shop para sa mga kailangan mo sa paglalakbay!

English: So many Vagrants, so little time!
Filipino: Ang daming Vagrant, siksikan ang oras!

English: Assists are masters of healing wounds in combat, enhancing abilities, and can be fierce opponents in close quarters combat. Never underestimate an Assist.
Filipino: Ang mga Assist ay eksperto sa pagpapagaling sa laban, pagpapalakas ng kakayahan, at puwede ring maging malupit sa close combat. Huwag maliitin ang isang Assist.

English: My name is Maki Ah and I am the Assist Master of Flarine. I'm here to guide young Vagrants on the path to becoming an Assist.
Filipino: Ako si Maki Ah at ako ang Assist Master ng Flarine. Gabayan ko ang mga batang Vagrant patungo sa landas ng pagiging Assist.

English: May Bubble watch over you.
Filipino: Nawa'y bantayan ka ni Bubble.

English: Are you as intrigued by magic as I am? Well, look no further! I have wands, staves, blinkwings and Magician Armor in stock now!
Filipino: Interesado ka ba sa salamangka? Huwag nang humanap pa! Meron ako'ng wands, staves, blinkwings at Magician Armor ngayon!

English: Please solve this mystery as soon as possible.
Filipino: Pakiayos mo ang misteryo na ito kaagad.

English: My mentor, Mule, got himself into some trouble. I highly doubt I'll ever see him again. I've taken it upon myself to continue running his magic shop. It's the least I could do.
Filipino: Ang mentor ko na si Mule ay napunta sa problema. Hindi ako sigurado kung makikita ko pa siya muli. Pinangasiwaan ko na ang magic shop niya bilang maliit na utang-pakapa.

English: My name is Marche Hordin and I run the Magic Shop here in Flarine. Teehee, I also have a crush on this hunk named Bradley! Oh um, excuse me, would you like to buy something? Please let me know if I can be of assistance.
Filipino: Ako si Marche Hordin at ako ang nagpapatakbo ng Magic Shop dito sa Flarine. Teehee, may crush din ako sa hunk na si Bradley! Eh, gusto mo bang bumili? Sabihin mo lang kung kailangan mo ng tulong.

English: Thank you for visiting my magic shop! Be careful out there!
Filipino: Salamat sa pagbisita sa magic shop ko! Mag-ingat ka roon!

English: The history of Madrigal... strange to say the least. I must discover the secrets!
Filipino: Ang kasaysayan ng Madrigal... kakaiba nga.

English: Do you know anything about the history of Madrigal? No? Well I've been uncovering some fascinating information as of late. It seems that much of our history has been conveniently covered up. Interesting, huh?
Filipino: Alam mo ba ang tungkol sa kasaysayan ng Madrigal? Hindi? Naghahanap ako ng ilang nakagugulat na impormasyon nitong mga nakaraang panahon. Parang marami sa kasaysayan natin ang sinadyang natakpan. Interesante, 'di ba?

English: Nice to meet you. My name is Martinyc Tictraibet. I know, it's a difficult name to pronounce, isn't it? Anyway, I'm a historian and I've made it my life's work to discover the secrets of Madrigal and document it's history.
Filipino: Ikinagagalak kitang makilala. Ako si Martinyc Tictraibet. Alam ko, mahirap bigkasin ang pangalan ko, 'di ba? Ako ay historian at ginugol ko ang buhay ko sa paghahanap ng mga sikreto ng Madrigal at dokumento nito.

English: If you learn of any interesting facts about Madrigal's history, be sure to stop by again!
Filipino: Kung may malaman ka tungkol sa kasaysayan ng Madrigal, balik ka at sabihin mo!

English: Welcome to the #b#cffff0000Flarine Quest Office#nc#nb! Looking for work? I may have a job for you...
Filipino: Maligayang pagdating sa #b#cffff0000Flarine Quest Office#nc#nb! Naghahanap ng trabaho? Maaaring may ipagawa ako sa iyo...

English: My name is Mikyel and I am the manager of the Flarine Quest Office. When our citizens post a hunting order or another task, it is my job to find the right candidate for the job. Check back in from time to time to see if I have anything available!
Filipino: Ako si Mikyel at ako ang manager ng Flarine Quest Office. Kapag nag-post ang mga mamamayan ng hunting order o ibang gawain, trabaho ko hanapin ang tamang kandidato. Balik-balik ka para tingnan kung may available!

English: *Hic!* All those other jobs are useless. USELESS! You hear me? A Mercenary can cut through anything!
Filipino: *Hic!* Ang ibang trabaho wala namang kwenta. WALANG KWENTA! Naririnig mo ba? Kayang putulin ng Mercenary ang kahit ano!

English: Ah, fresh meat! Who the heck are you and why are you talking to me? Only aspiring Mercenaries can have the privilege of speaking with the Great Mustang!
Filipino: Ah, bagong karne! Sino ka at bakit ka kausap ako? Tanging mga aspiring Mercenary lang ang may pribilehiyo makausap ang Dakilang Mustang!

English: I am Captain Mustang Loid of the Madrigal Job Training Center. You would be lucky to be trained by someone as handsome and talented as myself. Now, shoo!
Filipino: Ako si Captain Mustang Loid ng Madrigal Job Training Center. Mapalad ka kung ako ang magt-training sayo—ako ang gwapo at talentado. Ngayon, lumayas ka!

English: Oh good, you're leaving.
Filipino: Ayos, aalis ka na.

English: Cheer up child, there will be brighter days ahead of you!
Filipino: Ayos lang, bata—darating din ang mas magagandang araw!

English: I want to move to Flarine with my husband, but we have not received our citizenship yet. I heard that will happen soon.
Filipino: Gusto kong lumipat sa Flarine kasama ang asawa ko, pero hindi pa kami nakakakuha ng citizenship. Narinig kong malapit na 'yan.

English: I am Nina Horis, Paul is my husband.
Filipino: Ako si Nina Horis, asawa ko si Paul.

English: Good luck to you wherever you go. Thank you.
Filipino: Good luck sa kahit saan ka man pumunta. Salamat.

English: Looks like the weather today is going to be mostly sunny with a small chance of showers!
Filipino: Mukhang magiging maaraw ang panahon ngayon na may maliit na tsansa ng pag-ulan!

English: So what can you do for me, huh?
Filipino: Ano ang maitutulong mo sa akin?

English: Now that we've built this observatory, we can forecast the weather! I spent a long time building it, but it was certainly worth it. Are you interested in Astrology, young one?
Filipino: Ngayon na itinayo natin ang observatory, kaya na nating mag-forecast ng panahon! Matagal ko itong binuo pero sulit naman. Interesado ka ba sa Astrology, bata?

English: That's a question I don't get asked often. Although, that may be because I don't get many visitors. My name is Noie Hedltern. I built this observatory and I manage it's day-to-day maintenance.
Filipino: Bihira akong tanungin 'yan. Siguro dahil hindi madalas bumisita. Ako si Noie Hedltern. Itinayo ko ang observatory at ako ang nag-aasikaso nito araw-araw.

English: Safe travels! Stop by if you need to check on the weather!
Filipino: Safe travels! Dumaan ka ulit kung kailangan mong i-check ang panahon!

English: Welcome to Flarine!
Filipino: Maligayang pagdating sa Flarine!

English: The Library is located to my right and the reception desk is to my left. You can speak with Julia for to access your bank, view ranking information, or browse your Guild Warehouse.
Filipino: Nasa kanan ko ang Library at nasa kaliwa ang reception desk. Makipag-usap kay Julia para ma-access ang bank, tingnan ang ranking info, o mag-browse sa Guild Warehouse.

English: We Public Officials work directly with the mayor to better Flarine. We are here to serve you. If you have any questions, just ask!
Filipino: Kami, ang Public Officials, ay nakikipagtulungan sa mayor para pagandahin ang Flarine. Nandito kami para maglingkod. Kung may tanong, itanong lang!

English: Thank you for visiting the Public Office. #b#cffff0000For Flarine!#nc#nb
Filipino: Salamat sa pagbisita sa Public Office. #b#cffff0000Para sa Flarine!#nc#nb

English: I shall cut down our enemy with one swift thrust!
Filipino: Titighawin ko ang kalaban sa isang mabilis na suntok!

English: What do you want?! Can't you see I'm busy? We've got a lot of training to do! Begone, pest!
Filipino: Anong gusto mo?! Hindi mo ba nakikita na abala ako? Marami kaming training! Lumayas, peste!

English: They call me Phoho Andere and I am one of the hired Soldiers of Kion. No one, I repeat, NO ONE is better with a blade than I am! Care to test that theory with a little wager? Hmm?
Filipino: Sinasabing ako si Phoho Andere at isa ako sa mga hired Soldiers ng Kion. WALANG NAKAKAGALING sa akin sa paggamit ng blade! Gusto mo bang subukan iyon sa maliit na pusta? Hmm?

English: For Kion!
Filipino: Para sa Kion!

English: Mammy, it is cold!
Filipino: Nanay, ang lamig!

English: We are moving here to be with my father, but I do not like it here.
Filipino: Lilipat kami dito para sumama sa ama ko, pero ayaw ko rito.

English: My name is Pipi Horis, Paul is my father.
Filipino: Ako si Pipi Horis; ama ko si Paul.

English: We must find new Heroes, Kimel. It's our only hope.
Filipino: Kailangan nating maghanap ng bagong Hero, Kimel. Iyon lang ang pag-asa natin.

English: Ancients texts speak of 8 meteors that will fall from the sky the day the world comes to an end. These ancient texts say nothing of what will become of us after this event. Will we be saved? Destroyed?
Filipino: Sinasabing ang sinaunang teksto ay nagsasabing may 8 meteor na babagsak sa araw ng katapusan ng mundo. Wala itong sinabi kung ano ang mangyayari sa atin pagkatapos. Maliligtas ba tayo? Masisira?

English: The Great Wise Man, Radion, has decreed that we preserve the memory of the Heroes, and work towards defending ourselves against Shade once more. I am Sage Radyon, Radion's humble servant.
Filipino: Ang Dakilang Wise Man, Radion, ang nag-utos na panatilihin ang alaala ng mga Hero at maghanda laban kay Shade muli. Ako si Sage Radyon, lingkod ni Radion.

English: Goodbye, brave one.
Filipino: Paalam, magiting.

English: I love my money. Can anyone else out there bathe themselves in penya? Ha! I didn't think so!
Filipino: Sobra kong minamahal ang pera ko. May iba pa ba rito na naliligo sa penya? Ha! Akala ko nga wala!

English: Psha! I have no desire to talk to the poor. Leave my property now before I call the authorities! What, are you deaf? I said LEAVE! I have esteemed guests LibraX and Condulus coming over!
Filipino: Psha! Ayaw kong makipagusap sa mahihirap. Lumayas ka na sa pag-aari ko bago ko tawagan ang mga awtoridad! Ano, bingi ka ba? Sinabi ko—UMALIS KA! May papasyang kagalang‑galang akong sina LibraX at Condulus!

English: I told you to leave. *Sigh* Very well, if it'll get you to leave me alone I'll tell you. My name is Rudvilhil Tailerz and my passion is collecting. Collecting rare artifacts is my obsession! Well, aside from money, of course.
Filipino: Sinabi ko nang lumayas ka. *Sigh* Sige na nga, kung 'yan lang ang magpapahinga sa'yo—sasabihin ko. Ako si Rudvilhil Tailerz at koleksyon ang hilig ko. Ang pagkolekta ng mga bihirang artifact ang obsesyon ko! Siyempre, bukod sa pera.

English: What? Who doesn't like money?
Filipino: Ano? Sino ba ang hindi gusto ng pera?

English: Soldiers! Raise the blue flag of JeongHwa! We exist for the people! We fight for the people!
Filipino: Mga sundalo! Itaas ang asul na watawat ng JeongHwa! Nandito tayo para sa bayan! Lumalaban tayo para sa bayan!

English: The dark will be weakened wherever they step, and then new light shall shine!
Filipino: Hihinain ang kadiliman saan man sila tumapak, at sisikat ang bagong liwanag!

English: My name is Ryupang Silog I am Managing the House of Offerep and I lead the Blue Flag of JeongHwa soldiers
Filipino: Ako si Ryupang Silog. Pinamamahalaan ko ang House of Offerep at pinamumunuan ko ang tropang Blue Flag ng JeongHwa.

English: Faith and trust will always lead us.
Filipino: Ang pananampalataya at tiwala ang palaging gagabay sa atin.

English: How about conquering that mountain peak today? Hahaha I am just kidding!
Filipino: Paano kung sakupin natin yung tuktok ng bundok ngayon? Hahaha, biro lang!

English: The sky will turn dark and there will be a big storm. Then 8 lights will illuminate the ground and whoever views this will be saved.
Filipino: Magdidilim ang langit at may malakas na bagyo. Pagkatapos, walong ilaw ang sisiklab sa lupa at sinumang makakita nito ay maliligtas.

English: My name is Segho Pesin the Climber I manage the Drill Hall of Roentel My dream is to conquer every mountain in Madrigal!
Filipino: Ako si Segho Pesin, ang Climber. Pinamamahalaan ko ang Drill Hall ni Roentel. Pangarap kong sakupin ang bawat bundok sa Madrigal!

English: Each day has a new target! Hah!
Filipino: Bawat araw may bagong target! Hah!

English: Something, a creature perhaps, is stirring within the Mars Mine.
Filipino: May gumagalaw diyan—baka isang nilalang—sa loob ng Mars Mine.

English: Here, young one. Please pick one that you would like to do.
Filipino: Heto, anak. Pumili ka ng isa na gusto mong gawin.

English: My 8 pupils and I are working feverishly to prepare Madrigal's citizens for the day that Shade returns to destroy us all. Only through the guidance and strength of the Heroes, can we hope to persevere.
Filipino: Ako at ang aking walong disipulo ay nagsusumikap nang todo para ihanda ang mga mamamayan ng Madrigal para sa araw na babalik si Shade para sirain tayo. Tanging sa gabay at lakas ng mga Hero lang tayo may pag-asa na makakaraos.

English: I am known as Radion Angamel the Great Wise Man. When you've lived as long as I have, you sort of inherit the title. Nevertheless, it is our duty to use our knowledge of the Heroes to protect ourselves from impending doom.
Filipino: Kilala ako bilang Radion Angamel, ang Dakilang Wise Man. Kapag namuhay ka nang ganoon katagal tulad ko, parang minamana mo na ang titulong ito. Gayunpaman, tungkulin naming gamitin ang aming kaalaman tungkol sa mga Hero para protektahan ang sarili mula sa nalalapit na kapahamakan.

English: Go with the Heroes, my child.
Filipino: Sumama ka sa mga Hero, anak ko.

English: I love SUSHI! I could eat it all day, every day!
Filipino: Mahilig ako sa sushi! Kakainin ko 'yan araw-araw!

English: Making Sushi is a fine art, you see. You don't just boil some rice, cut up some raw fish, and wrap it in seaweed, ya' know? You have to put your heart into it. You have to LOVE it!
Filipino: Ang paggawa ng sushi ay isang sining. Hindi lang basta lutuin ang kanin at i-wrap ang hilaw na isda—kailangan mong ilagay ang puso mo. Kailangan mong MAHALIN 'to!

English: Hey there, you look a little hungry! My name is Sotta Segaku and I am the best sushi cook in al of Madrigal! Hang tight, I'll whip up some Naga Rolls just for you!
Filipino: Hoy, mukhang gutom ka! Ako si Sotta Segaku at ako ang pinakamahusay na sushi cook sa buong Madrigal! Sandali lang—ihahanda ko ang Naga Rolls para sa'yo!

English: You'll ever find better sushi anywhere in Madrigal!
Filipino: Hindi ka makakakita ng mas mabuting sushi kahit saan pa sa Madrigal!

English: Listen up, Soldiers of Kion! We've got a new directive from the Mayor of Flarine! It's time to train!
Filipino: Makinig, Soldiers of Kion! May bagong direktiba mula sa Mayor ng Flarine! Panahon na para mag-training!

English: Are you looking for work? We can always use another hired hand here. You look like you have some skill. Show me what you got!
Filipino: Naghahanap ka ba ng trabaho? Palagi kaming nangangailangan ng karagdagang hired hand. Mukhang may talento ka. Ipakita mo na!

English: My name is Teshar Testarotsa and I'm the leader of this rag-tag bunch. I manage the house of Hero, Aenn. Have you come to join our team?
Filipino: Ako si Teshar Testarotsa at ako ang namumuno dito. Ako ang humahawak ng House of Hero ni Aenn. Nandito ka ba para sumali?

English: Farewell, champion! See you on the battlefield!
Filipino: Paalam, kampeon! Kita-kits sa battlefield!

English: All I need is my hammer, Tesh! I require no training.
Filipino: Kakailanganin ko lang ang hammer ko, Tesh! Hindi ko kailangan ng training.

English: This hammer was forged from the steel of a thousand Shuhammas! No one else is skilled or strong enough to wield it, except for me of course. You don't believe me? Try it! Hahaha!
Filipino: Ang hammer na 'to ay pinalakas mula sa bakal ng isang libong Shuhammas! Wala nang makakatulad sa akin maliban sa akin. Hindi ka naniniwala? Subukan mo! Hahaha!

English: My name is Tomba Hammer and I am a soldier of Kion. This hammer goes everywhere with me. Everywhere. I live for battle, and a little extra penya doesn't hurt either.
Filipino: Ako si Tomba Hammer, soldier ng Kion. Kasama ko palagi ang hammer na 'to. Laban ang buhay ko—at konting penya, okay din.

English: Glory to Kion
Filipino: Kaluwalhatian para sa Kion

English: ~*I've, been working on the dirt pile, all the live long day!*~
Filipino: ~*Pinaghirapan ko ang buhangin buong araw!*~

English: It's rough out there, here, take this!
Filipino: Mahirap diyan—ito, tanggapin mo!

English: We, the High-Dwarpets, are different from the common Dwarpets. Don't even compare us with them, you hear me? That's a sure fire way to have your molecules melted into slime.
Filipino: Kami, ang High-Dwarpets, ay iba sa karaniwang Dwarpets. Huwag niyo kaming i-compare—maluluto ang molekula niyo kung gagawin niyo 'yan.

English: Oh really? You want to know who I am? Well let me tell you, 'friend'. I have been kicked and hated by humans since I was born, so I don't particularly like your kind. Happy?
Filipino: Ah talaga? Gusto mong malaman sino ako? Sige, 'kaibigan'—simula pa nang ipinanganak ako, itinataboy at kinamuhian ako ng mga tao, kaya hindi ko kayo gusto. Masaya ka ba?

English: Good riddance!
Filipino: Ayos na 'yan, bye!

English: Want to play with me?
Filipino: Gusto mo bang makipaglaro?

English: Pick something you can do. Something you can really do.
Filipino: Pumili ng isang bagay na kaya mong gawin. Isang bagay na talagang kaya mo.

English: Want to play with me? Ok!
Filipino: Gusto mo bang makipaglaro? Sige!

English: I am the noble, elegant, and sophisticated Ancimys.
Filipino: Ako ang marangal, elegante, at sopistikadong Ancimys.

English: My name is Ann Peltrot I am in charge of guiding Saint City and managing the Garden of Rhisis.
Filipino: Ako si Ann Peltrot at ako ang naggagabay sa Saint City at nagpapatakbo ng Garden of Rhisis.

English: This is Saint City, the holy morning city\n Is it not peaceful? I am really proud to live here\n As happy as I am to be here, there are still a lot of Masquerpets outside the walls.
Filipino: Ito ang Saint City, ang banal na morning city\nHindi ba tahimik? Ipinagmamalaki kong nakatira dito\nPero kahit masaya ako, marami pa ring Masquerpets sa labas ng pader.

English: Feel free to wander around and gather as much information as you can. \n It is a good time to meet all of the merchants and prepare for your travels.
Filipino: Maglibot ka at kolektahin ang impormasyon. \nMagandang panahon ito para makilala ang mga merchants at maghanda sa paglalakbay.

English: Hi! I am Bill. Come get everything you need in my General Shop.
Filipino: Hi! Ako si Bill. Dito mo makukuha ang lahat ng kailangan mo sa General Shop ko.

English: What can you do for me?
Filipino: Ano'ng maitutulong mo sa akin?

English: Tina and I love each other very much. But we are seeing each other secretly because Karin and Bulrox, my mentor, do not get along.
Filipino: Tina at mahal namin ang isa't isa nang husto. Pero lihim lang namin dahil hindi nagkakasundo sina Karin at Bulrox, ang mentor ko.

English: My name is Bill Bergenass and I run the General Shop in Saint City.
Filipino: Ako si Bill Bergenass at ako ang nagpapatakbo ng General Shop sa Saint City.

English: Good bye! Please come again!
Filipino: Paalam! Balik ka ulit!

English: Do you want something special? This is a very special bowl.
Filipino: Gusto mo ba ng espesyal? May espesyal na bowl ako rito.

English: What kind of bowl are you looking for? I made all the bowls here, so they are very special.
Filipino: Anong klaseng bowl ang hinahanap mo? Ginawa ko lahat ng bowl dito—espesyal ang mga 'to.

English: Hahaha My name is <Bowler Clo> and I am running a small bowl shop.
Filipino: Hahaha, ako si <Bowler Clo> at nagpapatakbo ako ng maliit na bowl shop.

English: Please visit whenever you need a special bowl.
Filipino: Bumisita ka kapag kailangan mo ng espesyal na bowl.

English: Shields that have both strength and beauty can be found here in my Shield Shop!
Filipino: Mga kalasag na may tibay at ganda—nandito sa Shield Shop ko!

English: What can you do for me?
Filipino: Ano'ng maitutulong mo sa akin?

English: It seems like Bulrox does not like me. Is it bad to make shields beautiful? I think there is nothing wrong with beauty, am I right?
Filipino: Mukhang hindi gusto ni Bulrox ang paraan ko. Masama ba kung maganda ang kalasag? Wala bang masama sa kagandahan, tama ba?

English: My name is Bozman Hangteiler and I run the Shield Shop in Saint City.
Filipino: Ako si Bozman Hangteiler at ako ang nagpapatakbo ng Shield Shop sa Saint City.

English: Thank you for visiting me. See you next time!
Filipino: Salamat sa pagbisita. Hanggang sa muli!

English: I will let you watch the best play, performed by Pepoview
Filipino: Papanuorin kita ng pinakamahusay na play ng Pepoview

English: I really like stories about heroes. So I am collecting books about them. Do you know the Book of Hero Combat? The book is really great!
Filipino: Gusto ko ng mga kwento tungkol sa mga hero. Kaya nag-iipon ako ng libro tungkol sa kanila. Kilala mo ba ang Book of Hero Combat? Ang ganda ng libro!

English: Pepoview is the best known troupe in Madrigal! I am Brodeay, one of the leaders. Nice to meet you.
Filipino: Pepoview ang pinakakilalang troupe sa Madrigal! Ako si Brodeay, isa sa mga lider. Nice to meet you.

English: Our troupe is always the best! If you come to one of our shows, I will let you watch for free.
Filipino: Palagi kaming pinakamahusay! Kung pupunta ka sa palabas namin, libre kitang papasok.

English: Come and see what superior weapon crafting is like at Weapon Shop of Bulrox!
Filipino: Tingnan mo kung paano gumagawa ng superior weapons sa Weapon Shop ni Bulrox!

English: What can you do for me?
Filipino: Ano'ng maitutulong mo sa akin?

English: Bill? It seems like he is seeing Tina secretly. Well, it does not matter to me because I like her. She is such a kind and polite girl! The real problem is that fat and obstinate woman! Darn!
Filipino: Bill? Parang nakikipagtagpo siya kay Tina nang lihim. Pero okay lang sa akin dahil gusto ko siya. Ang tunay na problema ay ang matabang at matatapang na babae! Argh!

English: My name is Bulrox SHynante and I run the Weapon Shop in Saint City. Bill is my best pupil. He is very, very smart Hahaha
Filipino: Ako si Bulrox SHynante at ako ang nagpapatakbo ng Weapon Shop sa Saint City. Si Bill ang pinaka-mahusay na estudyante ko—sobrang talino niya Hahaha

English: Good bye. There is nothing you cannot defeat with my weapons!
Filipino: Paalam. Walang hindi mo mapipigil gamit ang mga armas ko!

English: Shields for sale! Please form a single line.
Filipino: Mga kalasag na ibinebenta! Pumila kayo ng maayos.

English: You are in the right place if you are looking for a good shield. We only sell the highest quality ones.
Filipino: Nasa tamang lugar ka kung naghahanap ng magandang kalasag. Tanging pinakamataas na kalidad ang binebenta namin.

English: My name is Colack I opened this shop when Bozman started selling armor for Acrobats.
Filipino: Ako si Colack—binuksan ko ang shop na ito nang magsimulang magbenta si Bozman ng armor para sa Acrobats.

English: Please visit me again!
Filipino: Bumisita ka ulit!

English: Saint City, the most beautiful place in Madrigal! The ecology here is the blessing of God itself!!
Filipino: Saint City, ang pinakamagandang lugar sa Madrigal! Ang ecology dito ay biyaya mismo mula sa Diyos!!

English: Please solve these as soon as possible.
Filipino: Pakiayos agad ang mga ito.

English: There are various Masquerpets here in Saint City, so I always have lots to do Ha ha ha
Filipino: May iba-ibang Masquerpets dito sa Saint City—kaya laging abala ako Ha ha ha

English: My name is Dr. Estern I am studying the ecology of Madrigal with my 2 brothers.
Filipino: Ako si Dr. Estern at pinag-aaralan ko ang ecology ng Madrigal kasama ang dalawang kapatid ko.

English: Please enjoy the beauty and mystery of nature.
Filipino: Enjoyin mo ang ganda at misteryo ng kalikasan.

English: Ha ha ha The history of Madrigal is really mysterious. Do you agree? Ha ha ha
Filipino: Ha ha ha Ang kasaysayan ng Madrigal ay napaka-misteryoso. Sumasang-ayon ka ba? Ha ha ha

English: History should not be hidden at all, whether it is unpleasant or not.
Filipino: Hindi dapat itago ang kasaysayan—kahit na hindi kaaya-aya.

English: My name is Gothante Destratin and I am the chairman of the Madrigal Historical Society. You can just call me Gothante.
Filipino: Ako si Gothante Destratin at ako ang chairman ng Madrigal Historical Society. Pwede mo akong tawaging Gothante.

English: You have to know the history no matter what, right? Ha ha ha
Filipino: Kailangan mong malaman ang kasaysayan—tama ba? Ha ha ha

English: Everyone who wants to be a Magician, please come to me! My name is Hee and I will show you how to be the best Magician.
Filipino: Lahat ng gustong maging Magician, pumunta kayo sa akin! Ako si Hee at ituturo ko kung paano maging pinakamahusay na Magician.

English: Being a Magician is the greatest job ever. Magicians are always smarter and more powerful. You agree with me, right?
Filipino: Ang pagiging Magician ang pinakadakilang trabaho. Mas matalino at mas makapangyarihan ang mga Magician. Sumasang-ayon ka ba?

English: I am Master Hee Lyu, and I am a Job Master. I am in charge of finding new Magicians, but this job is very boring.
Filipino: Ako si Master Hee Lyu, Job Master. Ako ang naghahanap ng bagong Magicians—pero nakakainip minsan ang trabaho.

English: The light of the Magicians will protect you for all time.
Filipino: Ang liwanag ng mga Magician ang magpoprotekta sa'yo magpakailanman.

English: Welcome to Saint City. Saint Hall is our most beautiful structure. Enjoy the architecture!
Filipino: Maligayang pagdating sa Saint City. Ang Saint Hall ang pinakamagandang istruktura namin. Enjoy sa arkitektura!

English: Congratulations, your are now the illustrious leader of your very own guild!
Filipino: Congrats—ikaw na ngayon ang ilustre leader ng sarili mong guild!

English: Uh-oh, there seems to be a problem. Are you sure you are the party leader, have 3 party members, and have waited more than 2 days since leaving your last guild?
Filipino: Uy-uy, may problema. Sigurado ka bang party leader ka, may 3 party members, at lumipas na ng higit sa 2 araw mula nang iniwan ang huling guild mo?

English: Saint Hall is a very important structure. It is the Main Office and the symbol of Saint City. It was built long ago, and was the very first structure in our fair city. Cool, huh?
Filipino: Mahalaga ang Saint Hall. Ito ang Main Office at simbolo ng Saint City. Matagal na itong itinayo at ito ang unang istruktura sa lungsod. Astig, 'di ba?

English: You do not have 3,000,000 Penya. The tax for creating a new guild is 3,000,000 Penya. Please return to me when you have the money.
Filipino: Wala kang 3,000,000 Penya. Ang tax sa paglikha ng bagong guild ay 3,000,000 Penya. Balik ka kapag nakuha mo na ang pera.

English: My name is Helena Obette and I am the Assistant Manager of the Office of Saint City. How can I help you today?
Filipino: Ako si Helena Obette, Assistant Manager ng Office ng Saint City. Paano kita matutulungan ngayon?

English: Thanks for stopping by! Enjoy your stay in Saint City!
Filipino: Salamat sa pagbisita! Mag-enjoy sa pananatili mo sa Saint City!

English: Such a beautiful day! It's a shame to have to work!
Filipino: Ang ganda ng araw! Sayang ang trabaho!

English: If you come across any rare and precious artifacts in your travels, I can take a look at it and appraise it for you. Just remember good 'ol Helgar!
Filipino: Kung makakita ka ng rare at precious artifacts sa paglalakbay mo, puwede kong i-appraise. Tawagin mo lang si Helgar!

English: My name is Helgar and I'm a connoisseur of rare and precious artifacts. I used to be an archeologist, but then I found out that appraising artifacts for certain stinky rich people is a much better gig. It certainly pays the bills! Hahaha!
Filipino: Ako si Helgar at koleksyon ng rare artifacts ang hilig ko. Dating archaeologist ako, pero mas kumikita ang pag-aappraise sa mga mayayamang mapang-uyam. Hahaha!

English: Safe travels! Stop by if you run across any rare artifacts!
Filipino: Safe travels! Balik ka kapag may nadiskubre kang rare artifact!

English: Gah! An Aibatt's genetic structure is so perplexing! It's like... winged-cyclops DNA!
Filipino: Gah! Nakakabahala ang genetic structure ng Aibatt! Parang... winged-cyclops DNA!

English: The Madrigal Laboratory is here inside Saint Hall. It is the biggest science institute in all of Madrigal. The flying boards and brooms that we all use were developed here! Pretty cool, huh?
Filipino: Nasa loob ng Saint Hall ang Madrigal Laboratory—pinakamalaking science institute sa Madrigal. Dito dinevelop ang flying boards at brooms na gamit natin! Astig, 'di ba?

English: My name is Heltung Mondugane and I am the Chief Researcher of Project 2 here at the Madrigal Laboratory. I would show you around the lab, but we are running some Top Secret experiments at the moment.
Filipino: Ako si Heltung Mondugane at ako ang Chief Researcher ng Project 2 sa Madrigal Laboratory. Ipapakita ko sana ang lab pero may Top Secret experiments kami ngayon.

English: Ciao! Hey, if you come across any new species of Masquerpet, let me know!
Filipino: Ciao! Kung makakita ka ng bagong species ng Masquerpet, sabihan mo ako!

English: My name is Herth Emaldhan and I am a guide in Saint City.
Filipino: Ako si Herth Emaldhan, guide sa Saint City.

English: My name is Janne Orgriman and I am a guide in Saint City.
Filipino: Ako si Janne Orgriman, guide sa Saint City.

English: Please find my child! Please, Please,
Filipino: Hanapin ninyo ang anak ko! Please, please,

English: My baby was so cute I can still hear her voice.
Filipino: Napakacute ng baby ko—naririnig ko pa ang kanyang boses.

English: My name is JeongHwa Song I moved here to Saint City a few years ago.
Filipino: Ako si JeongHwa Song—lumipat ako rito sa Saint City ilang taon na ang nakalipas.

English: The name of my daughter is Jingyoung. Please let me know if you find her.
Filipino: Ang pangalan ng anak ko ay Jingyoung. Sabihin niyo sa akin kung mahanap niyo siya.

English: Healthy body for healthy mind! Here are some delicious foods made by Karin! They are good for your health!
Filipino: Healthy body, healthy mind! Narito ang masarap na pagkain ni Karin—mabuti sa kalusugan!

English: What can you do for me?
Filipino: Ano'ng maitutulong mo?

English: I do not like Bulrox, and I do not like Bill. How could my daughter like that kind of.. Ugh! It is making me crazy!
Filipino: Hindi ko gusto si Bulrox, at hindi ko gusto si Bill. Paano nagustuhan ng anak ko ang ganyang uri.. Ugh! Nakakainis!

English: My name is Karin Sharafobhan and I run the Food Shop here in Saint City. My daughter, Tina, is the beauty of Saint City.
Filipino: Ako si Karin Sharafobhan at ako ang nagpapatakbo ng Food Shop dito sa Saint City. Ang anak ko na si Tina ang kagandahan ng Saint City.

English: Good bye! Enjoy healthy food all the time!
Filipino: Paalam! Tangkilikin ang malulusog na pagkain lagi!

English: My name is Kimberley Prosis and I am a guide here in Saint City And Jeff in Flarine is my husband. Maybe you have met him.
Filipino: Ako si Kimberley Prosis, guide dito sa Saint City. Si Jeff sa Flarine ang asawa ko. Baka nakilala mo siya.

English: We offer quests put out by the citizens of Saint City. These quests are for anyone who is level 27 or higher.
Filipino: Nag-aalok kami ng quests mula sa mga mamamayan ng Saint City. Ang mga quest na ito ay para sa level 27 pataas.

English: Welcome! My name is Lancomi and I am the head of the quest center in Saint City. We collect quests from the citizens and then list them here for you.
Filipino: Maligayang pagdating! Ako si Lancomi at ako ang head ng quest center sa Saint City. Kinokolekta namin ang quests mula sa mga mamamayan at inililista dito para sa inyo.

English: My name is Leann Hentte and I am a guide here in Saint City.
Filipino: Ako si Leann Hentte at guide ako dito sa Saint City.

English: My name is Saint Pang. I am the second child of the Pang family. We have been managing the Lodelight for generations.
Filipino: Ako si Saint Pang, pangalawang anak ng Pang family. Matagal na kaming nagma-manage ng Lodelight.

English: Honor the will of Rhisis! Show the anger of Rhisis! Be the curse of Rhisis!
Filipino: Parangalan ang kalooban ni Rhisis! Ipakita ang galit ni Rhisis! Maging sumpa ni Rhisis!

English: Being a Magician requires strong spirit. You cannot be a real Magician if you do not train your spirit well.
Filipino: Ang pagiging Magician ay nangangailangan ng matatag na espiritu. Hindi ka magiging tunay na Magician kung hindi mo hinubog nang mabuti ang espiritu mo.

English: I am Sergeant Lopaze Jenip of the Madrigal Job Training Center I will help you to become the best Magician.
Filipino: Ako si Sergeant Lopaze Jenip ng Madrigal Job Training Center. Tutulungan kitang maging pinakamahusay na Magician.

English: Strong spirit! This is the symbol of the Magician. Please do not forget that.
Filipino: Matatag na espiritu! Ito ang simbolo ng Magician. Huwag kalimutan yan.

English: Do you want to use great and powerful magic? Then you should visit me, Martin!
Filipino: Gusto mo bang gumamit ng dakila at makapangyarihang salamangka? Puntahan mo ako—Martin!

English: Here, there are lots of things to ask you Ha ha ha
Filipino: Marami kang pwedeng itanong dito Ha ha ha

English: I heard that Mule got into trouble In terms of magic skill, Mule was much better than me. What a pity, I think Marche is having a hard time because of the incident.
Filipino: Narinig ko na si Mule ay nagkaproblema. Sa larangan ng magic skill, mas magaling si Mule kaysa sa akin. Sayang—nahihirapan si Marche dahil d'yan.

English: My name is Martin Scornsiege and I run the Magic Shop in Saint City I am also the chairman of the Society for the Study of Magic Ha ha ha
Filipino: Ako si Martin Scornsiege at ako ang nagpapatakbo ng Magic Shop sa Saint City. Ako rin ang chairman ng Society for the Study of Magic Ha ha ha

English: Good bye I hope your path will be lit by magical power.
Filipino: Paalam—sana maliwanag ang landas ng iyong magic.

English: Oh, cool! Wow! I really want to have one!
Filipino: Wow, ang astig! Gusto ko nang magkaroon ng isa!

English: Hehehe I like special things that nobody else has and pretty girls, too! Hehehe
Filipino: Hehehe, gusto ko ng espesyal na bagay na wala sa iba—at magagandang babae din! Hehehe

English: Hey, there! I am Mayun Song People are always saying I am impolite but this is just my style, man! Whatever..
Filipino: Hoy, ako si Mayun Song. Sinasabi ng iba na bastos ako pero gano'n talaga ang style ko! See ya!

English: See ya!
Filipino: Kita-kita nalang!

English: Welcome to the Saint City Station! We provide detailed and safe flying services!
Filipino: Maligayang pagdating sa Saint City Station! Nagbibigay kami ng detalyado at ligtas na flying services!

English: Our blood will soak the ground, and our shouts will echo across the skies. Then everything shall fall to their will.
Filipino: Dadalhin ng dugo namin ang lupa, at aalingawngaw ang sigaw namin sa kalangitan. Pagbagsak ng lahat sa kanilang kagustuhan.

English: My name is Parine Hoavent and I am the scion of Lillip. At the moment, I am learning how to manage the Station from Tina.
Filipino: Ako si Parine Hoavent, supling ni Lillip. Sa ngayon, nag-aaral ako mag-manage ng Station mula kay Tina.

English: We offer special services for our customers here at Saint City Station!
Filipino: Nag-aalok kami ng espesyal na serbisyo para sa aming mga customer dito sa Saint City Station!

English: It is strange. It is weird. Hmm
Filipino: Kakaiba. Nakakatuwa. Hmm

English: Oh! I was thinking so deeply that I did not know you were there. Yes, it is nice to meet you.
Filipino: Ah! Nag-iisip ako ng malalim kaya di ko napansin na nandiyan ka. Oo, ikinagagalak kitang makilala.

English: My name is Porgo Berldent and I am the mayor of the Society for Studying Disappearances in Saint City Ha ha ha
Filipino: Ako si Porgo Berldent at ako ang mayor ng Society for Studying Disappearances sa Saint City Ha ha ha

English: Would you work for our society? It is okay if you do not want to.
Filipino: Gusto mo bang magtrabaho para sa society namin? Okay lang kung ayaw mo.

English: Hello! Hehehe
Filipino: Hello! Hehehe

English: There are so many rare and precious things in the world I will never die until I collect all of them. Never!
Filipino: Napakarami ng rare at precious na bagay sa mundo—hindi ako mamamatay hangga't hindi ko nakokolekta lahat. Never!

English: I am collecting everything rare and precious in the world. Some people call me the Strange Collector.
Filipino: Kinokolekta ko ang lahat ng rare at precious sa mundo. Tinawag akong Strange Collector.

English: Good bye! Please find me if you have anything rare and precious!
Filipino: Paalam! Hanapin mo ako kung may rare at precious kang dala!

English: Oh! Please be careful, this is a very important one! It is an ancient document!!
Filipino: Oh! Mag-ingat—ito ay mahalaga! Isa itong ancient document!!

English: The ancient documents should be treated very carefully, because they are very old and fragile.
Filipino: Dapat dahan-dahan sa ancient documents dahil napakatanda at marupok na ito.

English: My name is Rovanett Ganelis I am in charge of keeping the ancient documents here at the public library in Saint City.
Filipino: Ako si Rovanett Ganelis at ako ang in-charge sa pag-iingat ng ancient documents sa public library ng Saint City.

English: Please visit again whenever you need to see any of the documents.
Filipino: Bumisita ka ulit kung kailangan mong tingnan ang mga dokumento.

English: Everyone in Saint City, are you happy? I am doing the best I can.
Filipino: Lahat sa Saint City, masaya ba kayo? Ginagawa ko ang makakaya ko.

English: I am making a tour to hear the opinions of people in Saint City. May I help you?
Filipino: Naglilibot ako para marinig ang opinyon ng mga tao sa Saint City. Maaari ba kitang tulungan?

English: I am the mayor of Saint City. I am in charge of pretty much everything here.
Filipino: Ako ang mayor ng Saint City. Halos lahat sa lungsod ay nasa ilalim ng aking pamamahala.

English: For Saint City!
Filipino: Para sa Saint City!

English: All the information you need about flying is here at the Station.
Filipino: Lahat ng impormasyon tungkol sa paglipad ay nasa Station.

English: I would like to ask you to do something for me.
Filipino: May hiling ako sa'yo.

English: Bill and I love each other very much, but my mother is not getting along with him. So we are seeing each other secretly.
Filipino: Mahal na namin ni Bill ang isa't isa, pero hindi magkasundo ang nanay ko sa kanya. Kaya lihim lang kami.

English: My name is Tina Sharafobhan and I manage the Station in Saint City. The woman who runs the Food Shop is my mother.
Filipino: Ako si Tina Sharafobhan at ako ang nagma-manage ng Station sa Saint City. Ang babae sa Food Shop ang nanay ko.

English: I hope you enjoy your flying!
Filipino: Sana mag-enjoy ka sa paglipad!

English: You know, they say acting is 'reacting'. Not sure why I need to dig a hole, though.
Filipino: Sabi nila ang pag-arte ay 'reacting'. Hindi ko maintindihan bakit kailangan kong hukayin ang butas, though.

English: My hands are covered with blisters! Anyone have any gloves?
Filipino: Punuin ng blisters ang mga kamay ko! May gloves ba diyan?

English: Who ever thought that trying to dig through solid stone was a good idea should be shot.
Filipino: Sino'ng nag-isip na maghukay sa solidong bato? Dapat barilin na 'yan.

English: We're rehearsing for our play, 'Romao and Juliat'. What do you think about my acting? Do you like it?
Filipino: Nagrerehearse kami ng play namin, 'Romao and Juliat'. Ano sa tingin mo ang acting ko? Gusto mo ba?

English: Greetings, theatre patron! We are all members of the Pepoview Troupe! We are renowned throughout Madrigal for our brilliant performances. I'm sorry to cut this short, but I must get back to rehearsal. Bye!
Filipino: Greetings, theatre patron! Kami ang Pepoview Troupe—kilala sa buong Madrigal sa aming brilliant performances. Pasensya na, kailangan na akong mag-practice. Bye!

English: On with the show!
Filipino: On with the show!

English: Oh, Juliat. You are as beautiful as a wet dog.
Filipino: Oh, Juliat. Ang ganda mo kahit basang aso.

English: Juliat, I beg you, close your window. You're scaring the children!
Filipino: Juliat, patahimikin mo na ang bintana. Natatakot ang mga bata!

English: Juliat, there's someone else. I'm leaving you for your brother!
Filipino: Juliat, may iba na. Iiwan kita para sa kapatid mo!

English: Our love is like a splinter. Unwanted, sharp, and painful!
Filipino: Ang pag-ibig natin parang splinter. Di gusto, matalim, at masakit!

English: We're rehearsing for our play, 'Romao and Juliat'. What do you think about my acting? Do you like it?
Filipino: Nagrerehearse kami ng 'Romao and Juliat'. Ano sa tingin mo ang acting ko?

English: Oh, happy dagger! Goodbye Romao!
Filipino: Oh, happy dagger! Paalam Romao!

English: My window will be open for you, forever.
Filipino: Bubuksan ko lagi ang bintana ko para sa'yo.

English: Romao, I will always love you. Please come back! What about our buffs?!
Filipino: Romao, palagi kitang mamahalin. Bumalik ka! Ano na ang mga buffs natin?!

English: Have at thee! Ha!
Filipino: Have at thee! Ha!

English: Our feud runs deep, Romao! You cannot have my sister!
Filipino: Malalim ang alitan namin, Romao! Hindi mo makuha ang kapatid ko!

English: Parting is such sweet... Erhm, line please?
Filipino: Ang parting ay napakatamis... Erhm, linya please?

English: Juliat, he doesn't want you anymore. On the bright side, you get to live!
Filipino: Juliat, hindi ka na niya gusto. Pero sa magandang bahagi, buhay ka pa!

English: I really need to finish these accounting numbers for the troupe. Man, I sure do hate math.
Filipino: Kailangan kong tapusin ang accounting numbers ng troupe. Nako, ayokong mag-math.

English: Oh, Iblis above! We have so much to do before our next performance. Will we be ready?
Filipino: Iblis sa itaas! Ang dami pa naming dapat gawin bago ang next performance. Handa ba tayo?

English: Where's my daughter? Has anyone seen her?
Filipino: Nasaan ang anak ko? May nakakita ba?

English: Pepoview! Pepoview! I love the cheer of the crowd after a good performance.
Filipino: Pepoview! Pepoview! Gustong-gusto ko ang sigaw ng crowd pagkatapos ng magandang palabas.

English: Would you do me a favor?
Filipino: Pwede mo ba akong pakiusapan ng pabor?

English: The whole world has been plunged into confusion and the only thing we can hear is groaning.
Filipino: Ang buong mundo ay nalulunod sa kalituhan at ang tanging maririnig lang natin ay mga daing.

English: Are you ready to carry this burden for your whole life? Do you have the confidence to be a Magician?
Filipino: Handa ka bang pasanin 'to buong buhay mo? May kumpiyansa ka bang maging Magician?

English: It depends on you whatever you choose. But there will be less of a struggle if you listen to your feelings.
Filipino: Depende sa'yo ang pipiliin mo. Pero mas madali ang laban kung susundin mo ang nararamdaman mo.

English: I am Major Wingyei Spero of the Madrigal Job Training Center. You are in the right place if you want to feel the strong magic power of a Magician.
Filipino: Ako si Major Wingyei Spero ng Madrigal Job Training Center. Nandito ka sa tamang lugar kung gusto mong maramdaman ang malakas na magic power ng isang Magician.

English: Believe in your own will!
Filipino: Maniwala sa sariling kalooban!

English: Do you want to use splendid magic? Then you should visit the Magic Shop that I, Haven, own!
Filipino: Gusto mo bang gumamit ng kamangha-manghang magic? Puntahan mo ang Magic Shop ko—Haven!

English: Whatever you choose, you should follow through.
Filipino: Anuman ang piliin mo, dapat mong ituloy.

English: To be honest I like Achaben. But I am not sure if he will accept me, because I am older than him.
Filipino: Sa totoo lang, gusto ko si Achaben. Pero hindi ako sigurado kung matatanggap niya ako dahil mas matanda ako sa kanya.

English: My name is Haven Bgeoner. I run the Magic Shop here in Darken.
Filipino: Ako si Haven Bgeoner. Ako ang nagpapatakbo ng Magic Shop dito sa Darken.

English: Take care
Filipino: Mag-ingat ka.

English: Here are various goods crafted by nomads! Come to the General Shop!
Filipino: Narito ang iba-ibang produkto mula sa mga nomad! Puntahan ang General Shop!

English: What will you do for me?
Filipino: Ano'ng gagawin mo para sa akin?

English: We are just nomad merchants, but we, the Khan Union, are well known for our various products in Madrigal.
Filipino: Kami ay simpleng nomad merchants, pero kilala ang Khan Union sa iba't ibang produkto namin sa Madrigal.

English: My name is Tandy Khan and I am selling various goods.
Filipino: Ako si Tandy Khan at nagbebenta ako ng iba't ibang goods.

English: Enjoy your flight!
Filipino: Enjoy your flight!

English: I will do my best for the happiness of the people in Darkon! Please trust me.
Filipino: Gagawin ko ang makakaya para sa kaligayahan ng mga tao sa Darkon! Pakititi ng tiwala.

English: What can you do for me?
Filipino: Ano'ng maitutulong mo sa akin?

English: I am making the rounds in order to hear the opinions of people in Darken. May I help you?
Filipino: Nag-iikot ako para marinig ang opinyon ng mga tao sa Darken. Paano kita matutulungan?

English: I am the Mayor of Darken City.
Filipino: Ako ang Mayor ng Darken City.

English: For Darken!
Filipino: Para sa Darken!

English: Hmm It seems that you are not the party leader, or you have less than 3 party members. Also, it may not have been more than 2 days since you left your old guild.
Filipino: Hmm Mukhang hindi ka party leader, o wala kang 3 party members. Baka hindi rin lumipas ang 2 araw mula nang iniwan mo ang luma mong guild.

English: Are you ready to create your new guild? If you are not, please go I am very busy right now.
Filipino: Handa ka na bang lumikha ng bagong guild? Kung hindi, umalis ka na—abala ako ngayon.

English: Create Guild
Filipino: Lumikha ng Guild

English: Keep Going
Filipino: Keep Going
