English: Leave my sight if you lack the necessary skills to succeed!
Filipino: Lumayas ka kung wala kang sapat na kakayahan para magtagumpay!

English: Speak with the Mayor of Saint City and complete the tasks he gives you. Then, collect the Rubies of Joy, Anger, and Sorrow. \n#bRequirement:\n - Must be the leader of a party and all party members must be between level 70 and 75.
Filipino: Kausapin ang Mayor ng Saint City at kumpletuhin ang mga tasks niya. Pagkatapos, kolektahin ang Rubies of Joy, Anger, at Sorrow. \n#bRequirement:\n - Dapat party leader ka at lahat ng party members ay nasa level 70 hanggang 75.

English: You can't do this by yourself, you fool! Come back when you find some friends
Filipino: Hinahanap mo ng tulong—hindi mo magagawa ito mag-isa, gago! Balik kapag may mga kaibigan ka na.

English: You will need to wait before you can challenge Iblis Leanes again.
Filipino: Kailangan mong maghintay bago mo muling hamunin si Iblis Leanes.

English: I cannot help you until you bring me the Rubies of Joy, Anger and Sorrow.
Filipino: Hindi kita matutulungan hangga't hindi mo dala ang Rubies of Joy, Anger and Sorrow.

English: If you bring me the rubies of Joy, Anger and Sorrow, I will allow you access to a secret tomb containing the creature Iblis Leanes.
Filipino: Kung dalhin mo sa akin ang rubies ng Joy, Anger at Sorrow, papayagan kitang pumasok sa isang secret tomb kung saan naroroon ang nilalang na si Iblis Leanes.

English: Are you too afraid to confront Iblis Leanes? Very well, as you wish.
Filipino: Natatakot ka bang harapin si Iblis Leanes? Sige na, ayon sa gusto mo.

English: I have no interest in getting to know you, stranger. Just bring me the rubies, and I will take you to the tomb.
Filipino: Wala akong interes makilala ka, dayo. Dalhin mo ang mga rubies at dadalhin kita sa libingan.

English: Iblis Leanes awaits a new challenger. Will you avenge the souls he bewitched?
Filipino: Naghihintay si Iblis Leanes ng bagong hamon. Ipapaghiganti mo ba ang mga kaluluwang napahamak niya?

English: Ugh, I am so BORED! Isn't there anyone out there that can make me laugh? Isn't there anything fun to do?
Filipino: Ugh, SOBRANG NWANAK! Wala bang makapagpatawa sa akin? Wala bang masayang gawin?

English: If you happen across any strange keys during your travels, do you mind trying them on this lock? Thanks!
Filipino: Kung makakita ka ng kakaibang mga susi sa paglalakbay mo, puwede mo bang subukan sa lock na ito? Salamat!

English: Hey, you there! Listen, I need some entertainment. It's pretty cramped in here. Do you know any jokes? Please, anything! I'd even settle for a 'Knock-knock' joke at this point!
Filipino: Hoy, nandiyan ka! Kailangan ko ng libangan. Masikip dito. Marunong ka ba ng jokes? Kahit 'Knock-knock' joke ok na!

English: I am most certainly not a well-known Magician that accidentally locked himself inside of a Magic Box. Nope, that's not me, and I haven't seen anyone like that. Nope. Anywho, so an Acrobat, a Mercenary and an Aibatt walk into a bar...
Filipino: Ako ay hindi isang kilalang Magician na aksidenteng na-lock sa loob ng Magic Box. Hindi! Wala akong nakitang ganoon. Anyway—isang Acrobat, isang Mercenary at isang Aibatt ang pumasok sa bar...

English: Gee, I hope there's enough air in here... Farewell!
Filipino: Naku, sana may sapat na hangin dito... Paalam!

English: I will give you a bead if you bring me sesame cake.
Filipino: Ibibigay ko sa'yo ang isang bead kung magdadala ka ng sesame cake.

English: I will give you a Red Bead if you bring me 700 sesame cake.
Filipino: Ibibigay ko sa'yo ang Red Bead kung magdadala ka ng 700 sesame cake.

English: I am Evil Tobby, the oldest of the Iblis brothers.
Filipino: Ako si Evil Tobby, ang pinakamatanda sa mga Iblis brothers.

English: Happy Thanksgivingday! Hmmm maybe not so happy.
Filipino: Happy Thanksgivingday! Hmmm, siguro hindi masyado.

English: I told you I will give you a bead if you bring me some sesame cakes.
Filipino: Sinabi ko na ibibigay ko ang bead kung magdadala ka ng sesame cakes.

English: I will give you an Orange Bead if you bring me 700 sesame cakes.
Filipino: Ibibigay ko ang Orange Bead kung magdadala ka ng 700 sesame cakes.

English: I am Evil Dorry, the second oldest of the Iblis brothers.
Filipino: Ako si Evil Dorry, pangalawa sa pinakamalaking Iblis brothers.

English: Happy Thanksgivingday!? Yeah right!
Filipino: Happy Thanksgivingday!? Parang hindi.

English: I told you I will give you a bead if you bring me sesame cakes.
Filipino: Sinabi ko na ibibigay ko ang bead kung magdadala ka ng sesame cakes.

English: I will give you a Yellow Bead if you bring me 400 sesame cakes.
Filipino: Ibibigay ko ang Yellow Bead kung magdadala ka ng 400 sesame cakes.

English: I am Evil Nana, the third oldest of the Iblis brothers.
Filipino: Ako si Evil Nana, pangatlo sa mga Iblis brothers.

English: Happy Thanksgivingday!? Maybe.
Filipino: Happy Thanksgivingday!? Siguro.

English: I told you I will give you a bead if you bring me some sesame cakes.
Filipino: Sinabi ko na ibibigay ko ang bead kung magdadala ka ng sesame cakes.

English: I will give you a Green Bead if you bring me 200 sesame cakes.
Filipino: Ibibigay ko ang Green Bead kung magdadala ka ng 200 sesame cakes.

English: I am Evil Tubby, the fourth oldest of the Iblis brothers.
Filipino: Ako si Evil Tubby, pang-apat sa mga Iblis brothers.

English: Happy Thanksgivingday!? No not really.
Filipino: Happy Thanksgivingday!? Hindi naman.

English: I told you I will give you a bead if you bring me some sesame cakes.
Filipino: Sinabi ko na ibibigay ko ang bead kung magdadala ka ng sesame cakes.

English: I will give you a Blue Bead if you bring me 100 sesame cakes.
Filipino: Ibibigay ko ang Blue Bead kung magdadala ka ng 100 sesame cakes.

English: I am Evil Pho, the youngest of the Iblis brothers.
Filipino: Ako si Evil Pho, pinakabata sa mga Iblis brothers.

English: Happy Thanksgivingday!? Not at all! Hahaha
Filipino: Happy Thanksgivingday!? Hindi talaga! Hahaha

English: I will give you a seedling if you bring me leaves.
Filipino: Ibibigay ko sa'yo ang isang seedling kung magdadala ka ng leaves.

English: I will give you a Fir Seedling if you bring me 100 leaves.
Filipino: Ibibigay ko ang Fir Seedling kung magdadala ka ng 100 leaves.

English: My name is Firdryad.
Filipino: Ang pangalan ko ay Firdryad.

English: I hope everything goes well with you!
Filipino: Sana maging maayos ang lahat para sa'yo!

English: I will give you a seedling if you bring me leaves.
Filipino: Ibibigay ko sa'yo ang isang seedling kung magdadala ka ng leaves.

English: I will give you a Persimmon Seedling if you bring me 300 leaves.
Filipino: Ibibigay ko ang Persimmon Seedling kung magdadala ka ng 300 leaves.

English: My name is Persdryad.
Filipino: Ang pangalan ko ay Persdryad.

English: I hope everything goes well with you!
Filipino: Sana maging maayos ang lahat para sa'yo!

English: I will give you a seedling if you bring me leaves.
Filipino: Ibibigay ko sa'yo ang isang seedling kung magdadala ka ng leaves.

English: I will give you a Pear Seedling if you bring me 600 leaves.
Filipino: Ibibigay ko ang Pear Seedling kung magdadala ka ng 600 leaves.

English: My name is Peardryad.
Filipino: Ang pangalan ko ay Peardryad.

English: I hope everything goes well with you!
Filipino: Sana maging maayos ang lahat para sa'yo!

English: I will give you a seedling if you bring me leaves.
Filipino: Ibibigay ko sa'yo ang isang seedling kung magdadala ka ng leaves.

English: I will give you a Pine Tree if you bring me 1,000 leaves.
Filipino: Ibibigay ko ang Pine Tree kung magdadala ka ng 1,000 leaves.

English: My name is Pinedryad.
Filipino: Ang pangalan ko ay Pinedryad.

English: I hope everything goes well with you!
Filipino: Sana maging maayos ang lahat para sa'yo!

English: Raising your own pet takes patience and dedication. Are you ready?
Filipino: Ang pagpapalaki ng sariling alaga ay nangangailangan ng pasensya at dedikasyon. Handa ka na ba?

English: ROOOARRR!! \nSorry... I was just practicing my tiger call. \nDo you have a pet? I love pets, it's what I live for!
Filipino: ROOOARRR!! \nPasensya... nag-eensayo lang ako ng tiger call. \nMay alaga ka ba? Mahilig ako sa mga pet—iyon ang buhay ko!

English: I come from a long line of Pet Tamers. My family has been taming pets for generations and I am the best Pet tamer among them. Feel free to visit me if you ever need help with your pet.
Filipino: Nagmula ako sa mahabang linya ng Pet Tamers. Ilang henerasyon na kaming tumatame ng mga alaga at ako ang pinakamagaling sa kanila. Bisitahin ako kung kailangan mo ng tulong sa pet mo.

English: Don't forget to feed your pet!
Filipino: Huwag kalimutang pakainin ang alaga mo!

English: Step right up, champions! Welcome to the Chip Emporium!
Filipino: Halina, champion! Welcome sa Chip Emporium!

English: Heya stranger! If your guild wins the Guild Siege, you will be awarded Chips for your victory. The armor sets I sell here in my shop are absolutely the best you can find! So, how many Red Chips do you have, hmmm?
Filipino: Hoy dayo! Kung mananalo ang guild mo sa Guild Siege, bibigyan kayo ng Chips para sa panalo. Ang armor sets na binebenta ko rito ang pinakamahusay! Ilan Red Chips meron ka?

English: I am Waforu, the Battle Merchant. I've had my share of victories in the sieges, but I'm getting to old for that sort of thing. I still love the competition, however, so I decided to stay in the business and offer my services as a Red Chip Vendor.
Filipino: Ako si Waforu, Battle Merchant. Marami na akong panalo sa sieges, pero tumatanda na ako. Gustong-gusto ko pa rin ang kumpetisyon kaya nag-stay ako at naging Red Chip Vendor.

English: So long, contender. May Rhisis be with you.
Filipino: Paalam, contender. Nawa'y sumaatin si Rhisis.

English: You don't want me in that arena. I'll bury you!
Filipino: Ayaw kita makita sa arena. Ipatay kita!

English: You know, most people simply don't understand that settling differences occasionally requires more than just petty talk. Sometimes, it requires a knuckle sandwich!
Filipino: Alam mo, maraming tao ang hindi maintindihan na minsan higit sa salita ang kailangan—minsan, kailangan ng suntok!

English: My name is Harold and I run this arena, so don't cross me or it's your head! If you wish to leave the arena, just speak with me again.
Filipino: Ako si Harold at ako ang nagpapatakbo ng arena na 'to—huwag mo akong hamunin o ulo mo ang ibabawas! Kung gusto mong umalis sa arena, kausapin mo lang ako muli.

English: Oh, burn! He took that one right to the face! It's a slobber-knocker!
Filipino: Ay, ang init! Tinamaan siya ng tama sa mukha! Ang peg, slobber-knocker!

English: Anyone need any supplies? I got what YOU need!
Filipino: Kailangan ba ng supplies? Meron ako ng kailangan MO!

English: Once you step foot into the arena circle, you can be attacked by anyone at anytime, so watch your back!
Filipino: Kapag pumasok ka sa arena circle, puwede kang atakihin ng kahit sino—kaya bantayan mo ang likuran mo!

English: Nice to meet you, friend. My name is Deek and I sell various foods, Posters, MP recovery items, and Arrows. Let me know if you need anything.
Filipino: Nice to meet you, friend. Ako si Deek at nagbebenta ako ng pagkain, Poster, MP recovery items, at Arrows. Sabihin mo lang kung kailangan mo ng ano man.

English: Feel free to visit me again if you need some more supplies for the arena!
Filipino: Bisitahin mo ulit ako kung kailangan mo ng dagdag na supplies para sa arena!

English: New to Madrigal? Visit your friendly neighborhood Buff Pang!
Filipino: Bago ka sa Madrigal? Bisitahin ang Buff Pang na kaibigan mo!

English: Hello there! I'm granting buffs to adventurers who haven't completed their second job change yet. Come see me anytime if you ever find yourself in need of a boost to your stats!
Filipino: Kumusta! Nagbibigay ako ng buffs sa adventurers na hindi pa nakatapos ng second job change. Puntahan mo ako kung kailangan mong dagdagan ang stats mo!

English: I am a Buff Pang. There are several of us throughout Madrigal and we are here to help adventurers by applying bonuses to their combat statistics. Are you in need of a buff, my friend?
Filipino: Ako ang Buff Pang. May iba kami sa buong Madrigal at nandito kami para tulungan ang adventurers sa pag-aapply ng bonuses sa combat stats nila. Kailangan mo ba ng buff, kaibigan?

English: Enjoy your stay in Madrigal!
Filipino: Enjoy your stay sa Madrigal!

English: Hey, you two! Stop that bickering, it's pointless! Take it to the arena!
Filipino: Hoy, kayo dalawa! Tigilan ang away—walang saysay! Dalhin na lang sa arena!

English: In the PvP arena, you can fight other adventurers such as yourself. If you meet unfortunate circumstances, and are slain on the arena floor, you will not incur any death penalties.
Filipino: Sa PvP arena, puwede kang makipaglaban sa ibang adventurers. Kung mamatay ka sa arena, wala kang death penalty.

English: My name is Lay and I am in charge of the PvP arena. I'll only let you in if you've chosen your first job.
Filipino: Ako si Lay at ako ang in-charge ng PvP arena. Papasukin kita kung napili mo na ang unang job mo.

English: Another one bites the dust!
Filipino: Isa pang napabagsak!

English: Why don't you sign up for a Madrigal tournament right away? Prove you are the best.
Filipino: Bakit hindi ka mag-sign up agad sa Madrigal tournament? Patunayan mong ikaw ang pinakamahusay.

English: Madrigal Tournament is about to begin. Hurry, to the arena!
Filipino: Malapit na magsimula ang Madrigal Tournament. Bilisan—sa arena!

English: Would you like to take a bet on who will win this tournament?
Filipino: Gusto mo bang tumaya kung sino ang mananalo sa tournament?

English: The odds have been released. Check the payout for the team you bet on.
Filipino: Lumabas na ang odds. Tingnan ang payout para sa team na tinayaan mo.

English: Only the strongest of guilds can achieve victory in the Secret Room!
Filipino: Tanging pinakamalakas na guild ang makakamit ng tagumpay sa Secret Room!

English: If your guild is top ranked in the Secret Room, you will receive weekly rewards!
Filipino: Kung top ranked guild kayo sa Secret Room, makakakuha kayo ng weekly rewards!

English: Hello, adventurer! I'm in charge of the Secret Room and the Forsaken Tower. If you have any questions about this heroic challenge, please don't hesitate to ask.
Filipino: Kumusta, adventurer! Ako ang in-charge ng Secret Room at Forsaken Tower. Kung may tanong ka tungkol sa challenge na ito, huwag mag-atubiling magtanong.

English: May Rhisis guide you, and be with you, young one.
Filipino: Nawa'y gabayan ka ni Rhisis, bata.

English: If you need any piercing cards converted, I'm your gal!
Filipino: Kung kailangan mong mag-convert ng piercing cards, ako ang tao mo!

English: Welcome, adventurer! If you have 10 piercing cards, I will attempt to convert the 10 that you give me into 1 card of the next level. I can't offer any guarantees, however, as sometimes you may only lose your cards.
Filipino: Maligayang pagdating, adventurer! Kung may 10 piercing cards ka, susubukan kong i-convert ang 10 na ibibigay mo sa akin sa 1 card ng susunod na level. Wala akong garantiya—minsan mawawala lang ang cards mo.

English: I'm the Card Master. After hearing about all the wonderful cards being thrown away, I decided to offer my services to the city of Flarine.
Filipino: Ako ang Card Master. Pagkatapos marinig ang mga cards na tinatapon, nag-alok ako ng serbisyo sa lungsod ng Flarine.

English: Stop by anytime, my friend.
Filipino: Bumisita ka ulit, kaibigan.

English: Would anyone like a jewel crafted or perhaps a jewelry setting created?
Filipino: May gustong magpagawa ng jewel o jewelry setting?

English: Hi there! I offer jewelry services to the citizens of Flarine and create and set jewels for those wishing to modify their Rare Weapons. I also remove blessings and level reductions from items, among other things!
Filipino: Hi! Nag-aalok ako ng jewelry services at gumagawa ng settings para sa mga gustong i-modify ang Rare Weapons. Tinatanggal ko rin ang blessings at level reductions sa items, at iba pa!

English: My name is Peach! I'm here to assist Boboku and help supplement his upgrading business. Stop by anytime!
Filipino: Ako si Peach! Tinutulungan ko si Boboku at sinusuportahan ang kanyang upgrading business. Bumisita ka kapag kailangan mo!

English: Take care. Remember, for anything to do with jewels, I'm your girl!
Filipino: Ingat ka. Para sa anumang bagay tungkol sa jewels—ako ang tao mo!

English: Attention everyone! We are looking for new Mentors. I will get you started on your way to becoming a Mentor!
Filipino: Atensyon! Naghahanap kami ng bagong Mentors. Tutulungan ninyo akong magsimula bilang isang Mentor!

English: Come see me if you want to become a Mentor.
Filipino: Pumunta ka sa akin kung gusto mong maging Mentor.

English: It is not easy to find worthy people to walk the path of a Mentor, it isn't for everyone.
Filipino: Hindi madaling humanap ng karapat-dapat maglakad sa landas ng Mentor—hindi ito para sa lahat.

English: Good afternoon. My name is Inisis. I am the current Mentor Teacher in Madrigal, well, not for much longer.
Filipino: Magandang hapon. Ako si Inisis. Ako ang kasalukuyang Mentor Teacher sa Madrigal—hindi na magtatagal.

English: Come back and see me if you are interested in becoming a Mentor.
Filipino: Bumalik ka kapag interesado kang maging Mentor.

English: What kind of hair style do you want? I can make all hair styles according to your taste.
Filipino: Anong hair style ang gusto mo? Kaya kong gawin lahat ayon sa panlasa mo.

English: I'm Demian. I am the Rock, Paper, Scissors Champion!
Filipino: Ako si Demian. Ako ang kampeon sa Bato, Papel, Gunting!

English: There always is a challenger.
Filipino: Laging may sumusubok.

English: I will gain my revenge!
Filipino: Maghihiganti ako!

English: Rock!! Paper!! Scissors!!
Filipino: Bato!! Papel!! Gunting!!

English: Hey, would you like to be Madrigal's Savior?
Filipino: Hey, gusto mo bang maging Tagapagligtas ng Madrigal?

English: Iblis' power is reviving!
Filipino: Nagbabangon muli ang kapangyarihan ni Iblis!

English: Who am I? You will see. By the way, would you like to be a hero?
Filipino: Sino ako? Malalaman mo. Gusto mo bang maging bayani?

English: Saviors of Madrigal!!! Come With Me!
Filipino: Mga Tagapagligtas ng Madrigal!!! Sumama kayo sa akin!

English: HEY! YOU!! COME ON!!!
Filipino: HEY! IKAW!! HALIKA NA!!!

English: Ghosts are nothing to be scared of!!!! I'm a super duper hero just like Kooro!
Filipino: Walang dapat katakutan sa mga multo!!!! Ako'y isang super duper na bayani, katulad ni Kooro!

English: I'm Nerco. I will be the Hero of Saint City just like Kooro!!! You better be good to me!!
Filipino: Ako si Nerco. Ako ang magiging Bayani ng Saint City tulad ni Kooro!!! Mas mabuting tratuhin mo ako nang maayos!!

English: Good bye! You must come back and see me.
Filipino: Paalam! Dapat bumalik ka at bisitahin mo ako.

English: I can't remember anything...
Filipino: Hindi ko maalala ang kahit ano...

English: What? You want to say something?
Filipino: Ha? May sasabihin ka?

English: I'm Hael. Suddenly, there are lots of monsters.. Something really bad is gonna happen, I can feel it.
Filipino: Ako si Hael. Biglang dumami ang mga halimaw.. May masamang mangyayari, ramdam ko.

English: What is going on???!!!!
Filipino: Anong nangyayari???!!!!

English: Phew.. I can't even rest cause of my son... you'll regret this!!!
Filipino: Huff.. Hindi ako makapagpahinga dahil sa anak ko... pagsisisihan mo 'to!!!

English: Do you really know my mother's mind adventurer?
Filipino: Alam mo ba talaga ang iniisip ng nanay ko, adventurer?

English: Hello, I'm Luzina! Don't you know? I'm mother of the year!
Filipino: Hello, ako si Luzina! Hindi mo ba alam? Ako ang Ina ng Taon!

English: Nerco is gone! That kid is such a troublemaker!
Filipino: Nawala si Nerco! Ang pasaway naman ng batang 'yan!

English: My hair scrunchie is gone. It's because of you!
Filipino: Nawala ang scrunchie ko. Dahil sayo 'yan!

English: I lost my favorite hair scrunchie. What should I do?
Filipino: Nawala ang paborito kong scrunchie. Ano'ng gagawin ko?

English: I'm Nersha. I'm Nerco's sister, but I'm different, I swear! I'm not the trouble maker he is!
Filipino: Ako si Nersha. Kapatid ako ni Nerco, pero iba ako, swear! Hindi ako kasing pasaway niya!

English: Please do me a favor! I lost my favorite hair scrunchie!
Filipino: Pakiusap, tulungan mo ako! Nawala ang paborito kong scrunchie!

English: IBLIS! He cursed me! Whyyyyyy?!?
Filipino: IBLIS! Pinatawan niya ako ng sumpa! Bakit naman?!?

English: I was a famous hero! Don't judge me by my looks, I was quite the dashing lad back in my day! What? You don't believe me?! I'm serious, my name was Samuel!
Filipino: Dati akong sikat na bayani! Huwag mo akong husgahan sa itsura—noon isa akong tunay na sing-kinis! Ano? Hindi mo ako pinaniniwalaan?! Seryoso, Samuel ang pangalan ko!

English: My name is Reodos. You cannot even imagine how great I was. I look like this because of Iblis' curse!
Filipino: Ako si Reodos. Hindi mo maiisip kung gaano ako naging dakila. Ganito ang itsura ko dahil sa sumpa ni Iblis!

English: I wish to lift this curse.
Filipino: Nais kong alisin ang sumpang ito.

English: How could Iblis' monsters be strong like this? They're getting stronger too!
Filipino: Paano naging ganito kalakas ang mga halimaw ni Iblis? Lalong tumitibay sila!

English: I'm searching for information as to what is going on in the Garden of Rhisis.
Filipino: Naghahanap ako ng impormasyon kung ano'ng nangyayari sa Garden of Rhisis.

English: I'm Handel. I'd like to know why Iblis' monster are around even though Iblis is gone.
Filipino: Ako si Handel. Gusto kong malaman bakit nandiyan pa rin ang mga halimaw ni Iblis kahit wala na si Iblis.

English: There are lots of monsters in the Garden of Rhisis.
Filipino: Maraming halimaw sa Garden of Rhisis.

English: Phew. Hero..what a busy job.
Filipino: Grabe, ang busy nga ng pagiging bayani.

English: Too busy! It's hard to help everyone!!! Hey! What are you looking at?!
Filipino: Sobrang busy! Ang hirap tumulong sa lahat!!! Hoy! Ano'ng tinitingnan mo?!

English: I'm Zoro! When someone needs help, I'll be there... I think.
Filipino: Ako si Zoro! Kapag may nangangailangan ng tulong, andito ako... siguro.

English: You need to find something that is worthwhile.
Filipino: Kailangan mong hanapin ang isang bagay na sulit.

English: Bad boys! They are destroying the forest. Mother nature does not deserve that kind of treatment!
Filipino: Masamang mga bata! Sinisira nila ang gubat. Hindi dapat tratuhin ng ganito si Inang Kalikasan!

English: Oh, Darkon is already a desolated place. Darkon will become a desolated desert if they continue to do so.
Filipino: Naku, Desolate na ang Darkon. Magiging disyerto pa ang Darkon kung itutuloy nila 'yan.

English: I'm Elaine, I'm the leader of the Darkon Clear Blue!
Filipino: Ako si Elaine, pinuno ng Darkon Clear Blue!

English: A healthy Mother nature is the most important for us all. But alas, it seems no one understands.
Filipino: Ang malusog na Inang Kalikasan ang pinakamahalaga sa atin. Pero tila walang nakakaintindi.

English: Nobody can follow me up here. They know what beauty is! Hahahah!
Filipino: Walang makakasunod sa akin dito. Alam nila kung ano ang kagandahan! Hahahah!

English: I'm exploring the Dekane Dungeon to do important research. Geez you really are annoying!
Filipino: Nag-eexplore ako sa Dekane Dungeon para sa mahalagang pananaliksik. Grabe, nakakainis ka talaga!

English: I'm Ainher, revival of Psykeeper hero~Hoho~ I know I'm perfect!!
Filipino: Ako si Ainher, muling pagkabuhay ng Psykeeper hero~Hoho~ Alam kong perpekto ako!!

English: I'm busy, so, can you please get out of my sight and stop bothering me?
Filipino: Busy ako, kaya lumayas ka at tigilan mo na ang panggugulo.

English: Last lesson.. This is the last..
Filipino: Huling leksyon.. Ito na ang huli..

English: Begone with you! I really need to focus. I can get what I wanted to learn from this very last lesson.
Filipino: Lumayas ka! Kailangan ko nang mag-focus. Makukuha ko ang kailangan kong matutunan sa huling leksyon na ito.

English: Sury, that's my name. Now please, leave me alone.
Filipino: Sury — 'yan ang pangalan ko. Ngayon, iwan mo na ako mag-isa.

English: It's hard to get... Inner realization.
Filipino: Mahirap makamit... ang panloob na pagkaunawa.

English: Hmm.. I can smell.. Ore.. Hey! Did you see a shining Ore?
Filipino: Hmm.. naaamoy ko.. ore.. Hoy! Nakakita ka ba ng kumikislap na ore?

English: What? You want what??
Filipino: Ano? Ano'ng gusto mo??

English: I'm Drico, second son of Nevil. I don't care why you are here, but you should be really careful around here.
Filipino: Ako si Drico, pangalawang anak ni Nevil. Wala akong pakialam kung bakit ka nandito, pero mag-ingat ka rito.

English: Go back to where you from, you human!!
Filipino: Bumalik ka sa pinanggalingan mo, tao!!

English: Hello my name is Yao-Rin.
Filipino: Hello, ako si Yao-Rin.

English: Oh! you are not the group of prophetic elected officials we have been waiting for. Leave.
Filipino: Ah! Hindi kayo yung grupong propetiko na hinihintay namin. Umalis kayo.

English: I am the fortune teller of the MewMew people.
Filipino: Ako ang manghuhula ng mga MewMew.

English: Good luck adventurer!
Filipino: Swerte sa'yo, adventurer!

English: Hello my name is Zaoma.
Filipino: Hello, ako si Zaoma.

English: Oh really! you're not who I thought you were.
Filipino: Ah talaga! Hindi kayo yung inakala kong kayo.

English: I'm an old man.
Filipino: Matanda na ako.

English: Goodbye.
Filipino: Paalam.

English: Hello my name is Locku.
Filipino: Hello, ako si Locku.

English: You are not our friend.
Filipino: Hindi ka namin kaibigan.

English: I am the leader of the MewMew people.
Filipino: Ako ang pinuno ng mga MewMew.

English: Goodbye.
Filipino: Paalam.

English: Hi, I'm Letana.
Filipino: Hi, ako si Letana.

English: Locku has appointed me a MewMew hunter and I intend to honour him by supplying MewMew refugees with fresh game every day.
Filipino: Itinalaga ako ni Locku bilang MewMew hunter at susuportahan ko siya sa pamamagitan ng pagbibigay ng sariwang pagkain sa mga MewMew refugee araw-araw.

English: I am the hunter of the MewMew people.
Filipino: Ako ang mangangaso ng mga MewMew.

English: Goodbye and see you soon.
Filipino: Paalam at magkita tayo muli.

English: Ah! Life in a tent is harder than you think.
Filipino: Ah! Mas mahirap ang buhay sa tolda kaysa akala mo.

English: I am Nemra.
Filipino: Ako si Nemra.

English: Goodbye. See you next time.
Filipino: Paalam. Kita-kits sa susunod.

English: You're coming with me to my tent?
Filipino: Sasamahan mo ba akong pumunta sa tolda ko?

English: I am the only makeup artist of Madrigal! I am also one of the guides in Flarine City. If you need any help or information, just ask me!
Filipino: Ako lang ang makeup artist ng Madrigal! Isa rin ako sa mga guide sa Flarine City. Kung kailangan mo ng tulong o impormasyon, itanong mo lang sa akin!

English: Who wants some makeup? I am a pro!
Filipino: Sino'ng gusto ng makeup? Pro ako!

English: You seem to me very tired, look at that messy hair! How about a little cut?
Filipino: Mukhang pagod ka—tingnan ang gulo ng buhok mo! Gupitan kita?

English: I am the only hairdresser of Madrigal! I am open all the day.
Filipino: Ako lang ang hairdresser ng Madrigal! Bukas ako buong araw.

English: Come back anytime you want!
Filipino: Bumalik ka kapag gusto mo!

English: Durandil swords are really great, too bad you can't mine with them...
Filipino: Ang mga espada ng Durandil talagang maganda, sayang lang hindi puwede magmina gamit ang mga 'yon...

English: I am Dekane, the creator of this mine.
Filipino: Ako si Dekane, ang gumawa ng minahang ito.

English: I like brave people like you! Here is the key that seals the door to the secret room. Good luck!
Filipino: Gusto ko ng matatapang na tulad mo! Heto ang susi na nagsisilbing selyo sa pintuan ng lihim na kuwarto. Swerte!

English: It's true that defeating a dragon is not an easy task for an adventurer. Come and try your luck again when you have completed the quest #bThe bottom of the mine#nb.
Filipino: Totoo na hindi madaling talunin ang dragon para sa isang adventurer. Subukan mong muli kapag natapos mo na ang quest #bThe bottom of the mine#nb.

English: See you bye bye!
Filipino: Kita-kits, bye bye!

English: Hello, what are you doing here?\n1.[Fight Meteonyker][IDS_NPC_Meteo]. \n2.[Who are you?][IDS_NPC_Dekane].
Filipino: Hello, anong ginagawa mo rito?\n1.[Fight Meteonyker][IDS_NPC_Meteo]. \n2.[Who are you?][IDS_NPC_Dekane].

English: I am Dekane, the creator of this mine. Now that you've proven yourself, I'll be able to tell you the real problem at the bottom of the mine.
Filipino: Ako si Dekane, ang gumawa ng minahang ito. Ngayon na napatunayan mo ang sarili, masasalaysay ko sa'yo ang totoong problema sa ilalim ng minahan.

In a secret room sleep dragons from ancient times created by Shade ages ago. To defeat them, you'll need a well armed team. Would you like to take up the challenge again?
[Yes][IDS_NPC_Yes] / [No][IDS_NPC_No]
